events.name: Clicked
events.summary: Occurs when the row is clicked.

events.name: DoubleClicked
events.summary: Occurs when the row is double clicked.

events.name: MouseOver
events.summary: Occurs when the row is mouse overed.

events.name: MouseLeave
events.summary: Occurs when the row is mouse leaved.

events.name: Drag
events.summary: The drag event is fired every few hundred milliseconds as an element or text selection is being dragged by the user.

events.name: DragEnd
events.summary: The DragEnd event is fired when a drag operation is being ended (by releasing a mouse button or hitting the escape key).

events.name: DragEnter
events.summary: The DragEnter event is fired when a dragged element or text selection enters a valid drop target.

events.name: DragLeave
events.summary: The DragLeave event is fired when a dragged element or text selection leaves a valid drop target.

events.name: DragOver
events.summary: The DragOver event is fired when an element or text selection is being dragged over a valid drop target (every few hundred milliseconds).

events.name: DragStart
events.summary: The DragStart event is fired when the user starts dragging an element or text selection.

events.name: Drop
events.summary: The drop event is fired when an element or text selection is dropped on a valid drop target.

events.name: ContextMenu
events.summary: The event is fired when an element or text selection is right clicked to show the context menu.

methods.name: OnDragHandler
methods.summary: Event handler for Drag event callback.

methods.name: OnDragOverHandler
methods.summary: Event handler for DragOver event callback.

components.summary:
$"""
       Options to override message dialog appearance.
       """

parameters.name: CenterMessage
parameters.summary: If true, the message dialogue will be centered on the screen.

parameters.name: ScrollableMessage
parameters.summary: If true, the message dialogue will be scrollable.

parameters.name: ShowMessageIcon
parameters.summary: If true, the message dialogue will show the large icon for the current message type.

parameters.name: MessageIcon
parameters.summary: Overrides the build-in message icon.

parameters.name: MessageIconColor
parameters.summary: Overrides the build-in message icon color.

parameters.name: OkButtonText
parameters.summary: Custom text for the Ok button.

parameters.name: OkButtonIcon
parameters.summary: Custom icon for the Ok button.

parameters.name: OkButtonIconColor
parameters.summary: Custom icon color for the Ok button.

parameters.name: OkButtonColor
parameters.summary: Custom color of the Ok button.

parameters.name: OkButtonClass
parameters.summary: Custom OK button CSS class.

parameters.name: OkButtonPadding
parameters.summary: Custom OK button padding.

parameters.name: CancelButtonPadding
parameters.summary: Custom cancel button padding.

parameters.name: ConfirmButtonPadding
parameters.summary: Custom confirm button padding.

parameters.name: ConfirmButtonText
parameters.summary: Custom text for the Confirmation button.

parameters.name: ConfirmButtonIcon
parameters.summary: Custom icon for the Confirmation button.

parameters.name: ConfirmButtonIconColor
parameters.summary: Custom icon color for the Confirmation button.

parameters.name: ConfirmButtonColor
parameters.summary: Custom color of the Confirmation button.

parameters.name: ConfirmButtonClass
parameters.summary: Custom Confirmation button CSS class.

parameters.name: CancelButtonText
parameters.summary: Custom text for the Cancel button.

parameters.name: CancelButtonIcon
parameters.summary: Custom icon for the Cancel button.

parameters.name: CancelButtonIconColor
parameters.summary: Custom icon color for the Cancel button.

parameters.name: CancelButtonColor
parameters.summary: Custom color of the Cancel button.

parameters.name: CancelButtonClass
parameters.summary: Custom Cancel button CSS class.

parameters.name: ShowCloseButton
parameters.summary: If true, the modal close button will be visible.

parameters.name: TitleClass
parameters.summary: Custom title CSS class.

parameters.name: MessageClass
parameters.summary: Custom message CSS class.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.summary: Defines the message dialog size.

parameters.name: Choices
parameters.summary: Represents a collection of options for message buttons. Each option is of type MessageOptionsChoice.

parameters.name: BackgroundCancel
parameters.summary: If defined the message dialog will be closed when the user clicks outside of it. Overrides the default behavior of the BackgroundCancel parameter.

parameters.name: Default
parameters.summary: Creates the default message options.

components.summary:
$"""
       Sets the options for Modal instance.
       """

parameters.name: UseModalStructure
parameters.summary: Uses the modal standard structure, by setting this to true you are only in charge of providing the custom content.     Defaults to true.

parameters.name: Stateful
parameters.summary: Keeps the ModalInstance in memory after it has been closed.     Defaults to false.

parameters.name: ScrollToTop
parameters.summary: If true modal will scroll to top when opened.

parameters.name: ShowBackdrop

components.summary:
$"""
       Sets the options for a Toast instance.
       """

parameters.name: Animated
parameters.summary: Specifies whether the toast should use an animated transition. If true, the toast will have smooth transitions during opening and closing.

parameters.name: AnimationDuration
parameters.summary: The duration of the animation in milliseconds. Applicable only when Animated is set to true.

parameters.name: Autohide
parameters.summary: Specifies whether the toast should automatically hide after a delay. If true, the toast will disappear without user interaction.

parameters.name: AutohideDelay
parameters.summary: The delay in milliseconds before the toast is automatically hidden. Only applicable when Autohide is set to true.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name(s) to apply to the toast.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the toast.

parameters.name: IconName
parameters.summary: The icon to display inside the toast header.

parameters.name: ShowIcon
parameters.summary: Determines whether to display an icon in the toast.

parameters.name: IconStyle
parameters.summary: Specifies the style of the icon displayed in the toast.

parameters.name: IconSize
parameters.summary: The size of the icon displayed in the toast.

parameters.name: Default
parameters.summary: Creates and returns the default options for a toast instance.

events.name: Opening
events.summary: Occurs before the toast is opened.     Use this to intercept or modify the toast's behavior before it becomes visible.

events.name: Closing
events.summary: Occurs before the toast is closed.     Use this to intercept or modify the toast's behavior before it is hidden.

events.name: Opened
events.summary: Occurs after the toast has been successfully opened.

events.name: Closed
events.summary: Occurs after the toast has been successfully closed.

components.summary:
$"""
       Defines the global Blazorise options.
       """

parameters.name: ProductToken
parameters.summary: Defines the product token issued by the Blazorise licensing system.

parameters.name: Immediate
parameters.summary: If true the text in TextInput will be changed after each key press.

parameters.name: Debounce
parameters.summary: If true the entered into TextInput will be slightly delayed before submitting it to the internal value.

parameters.name: DebounceInterval
parameters.summary: Interval in milliseconds that entered text will be delayed from submitting to the TextInput internal value.

parameters.name: ChangeSliderOnHold
parameters.summary: If true the value in Slider will be changed while holding and moving the slider.

parameters.name: AutoCloseParent
parameters.summary: If true, the component that can control it's parent will automatically close it.
parameters.remarks: This behavior can be seen on CloseButton that can auto-close it's Alert or it's Modal parent component.

parameters.name: ThemeCacheSize
parameters.summary: Maximum amount of Theme that are cached at the same time. When set to a value < 1, the ThemeCache is deactivated.

parameters.name: ShowNumericStepButtons
parameters.summary: If true, the spin buttons on NumericPicker will be visible.

parameters.name: EnableNumericStep
parameters.summary: If true, enables change of NumericPicker by pressing on step buttons or by keyboard up/down keys.

parameters.name: ModalFocusTrap
parameters.summary: If true, modal will keep input focus.

parameters.name: IconStyle
parameters.summary: Defines the default icon style. Can be overriden on an each individual icon.

parameters.name: IconSize
parameters.summary: Defines the default icon size. Can be overriden on an each individual icon.

parameters.name: Services
parameters.summary: Gets the service provider.

parameters.name: SafeJsInvoke
parameters.summary: Whether to safely invoke internal javascript. Will ignore any exceptions that might be thrown as part of the javascript invoke process.

parameters.name: TooltipOptions
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the options used to configure the behavior of the Tooltip. This allows you to customize the Tooltip's appearance and timing.

events.name: ValidationMessageLocalizer
events.summary: Global handler that can be used to override and localize validation messages before they are shown on the ValidationError or ValidationSuccess.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents the options available for configuring the behavior of a Tooltip in Blazorise.
       """

parameters.name: ShowDelay
parameters.summary: Specifies the delay in milliseconds (ms) after a trigger event before a Tooltip is shown. Default is null for no delay.

parameters.name: HideDelay
parameters.summary: Specifies the delay in milliseconds (ms) after a trigger event before a Tooltip is hidden. Default is null for no delay.

components.summary:
$"""
       Holds the options for the theme.
       """

parameters.name: Enabled
parameters.summary: Globaly enable or disable the theme.

parameters.name: White
parameters.summary: Defines the base theme light color.

parameters.name: Black
parameters.summary: Defines the base theme dark color.

parameters.name: LuminanceThreshold
parameters.summary: The yiq lightness value that determines when the lightness of color changes from \"dark\" to \"light\". Acceptable values are between 0 and 255.

parameters.name: IsGradient
parameters.summary: Enables the gradient background colors.

parameters.name: IsRounded
parameters.summary: Globaly enables rounded elements.

parameters.name: ValidBreakpoints
parameters.summary: Gets the valid breakpoints.

parameters.name: ValidContainerMaxWidths
parameters.summary: Gets the valid sizes for container.

parameters.name: ValidColors
parameters.summary: Gets the valid variant colors.

parameters.name: ValidBackgroundColors
parameters.summary: Gets the valid background colors.

parameters.name: ValidTextColors
parameters.summary: Gets the valid text colors.

parameters.name: BodyOptions
parameters.summary: Defined the body options.

parameters.name: BreakpointOptions
parameters.summary: Global options for media breakpoints.

parameters.name: ContainerMaxWidthOptions
parameters.summary: Define the maximum width of container for different screen sizes.

parameters.name: ColorOptions
parameters.summary: Used to override default theme colors.

parameters.name: BackgroundOptions
parameters.summary: Used to override default background colors.

parameters.name: BorderOptions
parameters.summary: Used to override default border styles.

parameters.name: TextColorOptions
parameters.summary: Used to override default background colors.

parameters.name: ThemeColorInterval
parameters.summary: Set a specific jump point for requesting color jumps

parameters.name: ButtonOptions

parameters.name: DropdownOptions
parameters.summary: Theme options to override the Dropdown styles.

parameters.name: InputOptions

parameters.name: CardOptions

parameters.name: ModalOptions

parameters.name: TabsOptions
parameters.summary: Theme options to override the Tabs component styles.

parameters.name: ProgressOptions

parameters.name: RatingOptions
parameters.summary: Theme options to override the Rating component styles.

parameters.name: AlertOptions

parameters.name: TableOptions

parameters.name: BreadcrumbOptions

parameters.name: BadgeOptions
parameters.summary: Theme options to override the Badge component styles.

parameters.name: SwitchOptions

parameters.name: DividerOptions

parameters.summary: Theme options to override the Tooltip component styles.

parameters.name: ListGroupItemOptions
parameters.summary: Theme options to override the ListGroupItem component styles.

parameters.name: SpacingOptions
parameters.summary: Theme options to override the spacing utilities.

methods.name: ThemeHasChanged
methods.summary: Must be called to rebuild the theme.

components.summary: $""" Default implementation of IThemeGenerator. """

methods.name: GenerateVariables
methods.summary: Generates a CSS variables based on the defined Theme options.

methods.name: GenerateStyles
methods.summary: Generates a CSS styles based on the defined Theme options.

methods.name: TintColor
methods.summary: Sass tint-color($color, $weight) = mix(white, $color, $weight).

methods.name: ShadeColor
methods.summary: Sass shade-color($color, $weight) = mix(black, $color, $weight). (Not used by Bootstrap’s subtle, but handy.)

components.summary:
$"""
       An accordion is a vertically stacked list of headers that reveal or hide associated sections of content.
       """

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Accordion.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this BarDropdownItem.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

components.summary:
$"""
       Clickable button for actions in forms, dialogs, and more with support for multiple sizes, states, and more.
       """

parameters.name: Type
parameters.summary: Defines the button type.

parameters.name: Color
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the button color.

parameters.name: Intent
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the button intent.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.summary: Changes the size of a button.

parameters.name: Outline
parameters.summary: Makes the button to have the outlines.

parameters.name: Disabled
parameters.summary: When set to 'true', disables the component's functionality and places it in a disabled state.

parameters.name: Active
parameters.summary: When set to 'true', places the component in the active state with active styling.

parameters.name: Block
parameters.summary: Makes the button to span the full width of a parent.

parameters.name: Loading
parameters.summary: Shows the loading spinner or a LoadingTemplate.

parameters.name: LoadingTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the component loading template.

parameters.name: PreventDefaultOnSubmit
parameters.summary: Prevents a default form-post when button type is set to Submit.

parameters.name: Command
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the command to be executed when clicked on a button.

parameters.name: CommandParameter
parameters.summary: Reflects the parameter to pass to the CommandProperty upon execution.

parameters.name: To
parameters.summary: Denotes the target route of the Link button.

parameters.name: Target
parameters.summary: The target attribute specifies where to open the linked document for a Link.

parameters.name: StretchedLink
parameters.summary: Makes any HTML element or component clickable by “stretching” a nested link.

parameters.name: TabIndex
parameters.summary: If defined, indicates that its element can be focused and can participates in sequential keyboard navigation.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Button.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

       Dropdown is toggleable, contextual overlay for displaying lists of links and more.
       """

parameters.name: Visible

parameters.summary: If true, a dropdown menu will be aligned to the end.

parameters.summary: If true, dropdown would not react to button click.

parameters.summary:
Provides an alternative, or custom anchor element id for the dropdown menu.

This is useful when you want the dropdown menu to be anchored from a different element than the toggle.

components.summary:
$"""
       Input component with support for single of multi file upload.
       """

parameters.name: Multiple
parameters.summary: Enables the multiple file selection.

parameters.name: Directory
parameters.summary: Gets or Sets whether file picker should upload directories.

parameters.name: Placeholder
parameters.summary: Sets the placeholder for the empty file input.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.summary: Specifies the types of files that the input accepts. See w3schools.com.

parameters.name: MaxChunkSize
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the max chunk size when uploading the file. Take note that if you're using IFileEntry,CancellationToken) you're provided with a stream and should configure the chunk size when handling with the stream.
parameters.remarks: See docs.microsoft.com.

parameters.name: MaxFileSize
parameters.summary: Maximum file size in bytes, checked before starting upload (note: never trust client, always check file size at server-side). Defaults to long.MaxValue.

parameters.name: SegmentFetchTimeout
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the Segment Fetch Timeout when uploading the file.

parameters.name: AutoReset
parameters.summary: If true file input will be automatically reset after it has being uploaded.

parameters.name: BrowseButtonLocalizer
parameters.summary: Function used to handle custom localization that will override a default ITextLocalizer.

parameters.name: DisableProgressReport
parameters.summary:
Gets or sets whether report progress should be disabled. By enabling this setting, Progressed and Written callbacks won't be called. Internal file progress won't be tracked.

This setting can speed up file transfer considerably.

parameters.name: AriaInvalid
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-invalid attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides the validation-derived aria-invalid state.

parameters.name: AriaDescribedBy
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-describedby attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides help and validation message ids generated by Field and Validation.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the value inside the input field.

parameters.name: ValueExpression
parameters.summary: Gets or sets an expression that identifies the input value.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.summary: Sets the size of the input control.

parameters.name: ReadOnly
parameters.summary: Add the readonly boolean attribute on an input to prevent modification of the input’s value.

parameters.name: Disabled
parameters.summary: Add the disabled boolean attribute on an input to prevent user interactions and make it appear lighter.

parameters.name: Autofocus
parameters.summary: Set's the focus to the component after the rendering is done.

parameters.name: Feedback
parameters.summary: Placeholder for validation messages.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this FileInput.

parameters.name: TabIndex
parameters.summary: If defined, indicates that its element can be focused and can participates in sequential keyboard navigation.

parameters.name: Classes
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class names for component elements.

parameters.name: Styles
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles for component elements.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

events.name: Changed
events.summary: Occurs every time the selected file has changed, including when the reset operation is executed.

events.name: Started
events.summary: Occurs when an individual file upload has started.

events.name: Ended
events.summary: Occurs when an individual file upload has ended.

events.name: Written
events.summary: Occurs every time the part of file has being written to the destination stream.

events.name: Progressed
events.summary: Notifies the progress of file being written to the destination stream.

events.name: ValueChanged
events.summary: Occurs after value has changed.

events.name: KeyDown
events.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed down while the control has focus.

events.name: KeyPress
events.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

events.name: KeyUp
events.summary: Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.

events.name: Blur
events.summary: The blur event fires when an element has lost focus.

events.name: OnFocus
events.summary: Occurs when the input box gains or loses focus.

events.name: FocusIn
events.summary: Occurs when the input box gains focus.

events.name: FocusOut
events.summary: Occurs when the input box loses focus.

events.name: CustomValidationValue
events.summary: Used to provide custom validation value on which the validation will be processed with the Validator handler.
events.remarks: Should be used carefully as it's only meant for some special cases when input is used     in a wrapper component, like Autocomplete or SelectList.

methods.name: NotifyChange
methods.summary: Notifies the component that file input value has changed.

methods.name: UpdateFileStartedAsync
methods.summary: Notifies the component that file upload is about to start.

methods.name: UpdateFileEndedAsync
methods.summary: Notifies the component that file upload has ended.

methods.name: UpdateFileWrittenAsync
methods.summary: Updates component with the latest file data.

methods.name: UpdateFileProgressAsync
methods.summary: Updated the component with the latest upload progress.

methods.name: WriteToStreamAsync
methods.summary: Writes the file data to the target stream.

methods.name: OpenReadStream
methods.summary: Opens the stream for reading the uploaded file.

methods.name: RemoveFileEntry
methods.summary: Removes the file entry from js dictionary.

methods.name: Reset
methods.summary: Manually resets the input file value.

methods.name: RemoveFile
methods.summary: Removes a file from the current file selection.

methods.name: ShowPicker
methods.summary: Show a browser picker for the file input.

methods.name: Focus
methods.summary: Sets the focus on the underline element.

methods.name: Revalidate
methods.summary: Forces the Validation (if any is used) to re-validate with the new custom or internal value.

components.summary:
$"""
       The focus trap component allows to restrict TAB key navigation inside the component.
       """

parameters.name: Active
parameters.summary: If true the TAB focus will be activated.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the reference to the parent FocusTrap component.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

methods.name: SetFocus
methods.summary: Sets the focus trap.

methods.name: NotifyFocusableComponentInitialized
methods.summary: Notifies the container component that its IFocusableComponent is initialized.

methods.name: NotifyFocusableComponentRemoved
methods.summary: Notifies the container component that its IFocusableComponent is removed.

$"""
       Highlights the part of the text based on a search term.
       """

parameters.summary: The whole text in which a HighlightedText will be highlighted.

parameters.name: HighlightedText
parameters.summary: The search term to be highlighted.

parameters.name: HighlightedTexts
parameters.summary: Array of search terms to be highlighted.
parameters.remarks: Although this is an array, mutating it in-place (e.g. HighlightedTexts[1] = \"new value\") will not trigger a change. To update highlights, always reassign the entire array.

parameters.name: CaseSensitive
parameters.summary: Whether or not the search term will be case sensitive.

parameters.name: NextBoundary
parameters.summary: A regex expression used for searching the word boundaries.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

components.summary:
$"""
       A component that renders an anchor tag, automatically toggling its 'active'     class based on whether its 'href' matches the current URI.
       """

parameters.name: To
parameters.summary: Denotes the target route of the link.

parameters.name: Match
parameters.summary: URL matching behavior for a link.

parameters.name: Target
parameters.summary: The target attribute specifies where to open the linked document.

parameters.name: Title
parameters.summary: Specify extra information about the element.

parameters.name: Unstyled
parameters.summary: Removes default color styles from the link.

parameters.name: Stretched
parameters.summary: Makes any HTML element or component clickable by “stretching” a nested link.

parameters.name: Disabled
parameters.summary: Makes the link look inactive by adding the disabled boolean attribute.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Link.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

events.name: CustomMatch
events.summary: A callback function that is used to compare current uri with the user defined uri. If defined, the Match parameter will be ignored.

events.name: Clicked
events.summary: Occurs when the link is clicked.

components.summary:
$"""
       Component that allows you to display and edit multi-line text.
       """

parameters.name: MaxLength
parameters.summary: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the input element.

parameters.name: Rows
parameters.summary: Specifies the number lines in the input element.

parameters.name: ReplaceTab
parameters.summary: If set to true, ReplaceTab will insert a tab instead of cycle input focus.

parameters.name: TabSize
parameters.summary: Defines the number of characters that tab key will override.

parameters.name: SoftTabs
parameters.summary: If set to true, spaces will be used instead of a tab character

parameters.name: AutoSize
parameters.summary: If true, the textarea will automatically grow in height according to its content.

parameters.name: Immediate
parameters.summary: If true the text in will be changed after each key press.
parameters.remarks: Note that setting this will override global settings in Immediate.

parameters.name: Debounce
parameters.summary: If true the entered text will be slightly delayed before submitting it to the internal value.

parameters.name: DebounceInterval
parameters.summary: Interval in milliseconds that entered text will be delayed from submitting to the internal value.

parameters.name: Placeholder
parameters.summary: Sets the placeholder for the empty text.

parameters.name: Plaintext
parameters.summary: Sets the class to remove the default form field styling and preserve the correct margin and padding.

parameters.name: Color
parameters.summary: Sets the input text color.

parameters.name: Intent
parameters.summary: Sets the input text intent.

parameters.name: Pattern
parameters.summary: The pattern attribute specifies a regular expression that the input element's value is checked against on form validation.

parameters.name: AriaInvalid
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-invalid attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides the validation-derived aria-invalid state.

parameters.name: AriaDescribedBy
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-describedby attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides help and validation message ids generated by Field and Validation.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the value inside the input field.

parameters.name: ValueExpression
parameters.summary: Gets or sets an expression that identifies the input value.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.summary: Sets the size of the input control.

parameters.name: ReadOnly
parameters.summary: Add the readonly boolean attribute on an input to prevent modification of the input’s value.

parameters.name: Disabled
parameters.summary: Add the disabled boolean attribute on an input to prevent user interactions and make it appear lighter.

parameters.name: Autofocus
parameters.summary: Set's the focus to the component after the rendering is done.

parameters.name: Feedback
parameters.summary: Placeholder for validation messages.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this MemoInput.

parameters.name: TabIndex
parameters.summary: If defined, indicates that its element can be focused and can participates in sequential keyboard navigation.

parameters.name: Classes
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class names for component elements.

parameters.name: Styles
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles for component elements.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

events.name: ValueChanged
events.summary: Occurs after value has changed.

events.name: KeyDown
events.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed down while the control has focus.

events.name: KeyPress
events.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

events.name: KeyUp
events.summary: Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.

events.name: Blur
events.summary: The blur event fires when an element has lost focus.

events.name: OnFocus
events.summary: Occurs when the input box gains or loses focus.

events.name: FocusIn
events.summary: Occurs when the input box gains focus.

events.name: FocusOut
events.summary: Occurs when the input box loses focus.

events.name: CustomValidationValue
events.summary: Used to provide custom validation value on which the validation will be processed with the Validator handler.
events.remarks: Should be used carefully as it's only meant for some special cases when input is used     in a wrapper component, like Autocomplete or SelectList.

methods.name: Select
methods.summary: Select all text in the underline component.

methods.name: Focus
methods.summary: Sets the focus on the underline element.

methods.name: Revalidate
methods.summary: Forces the Validation (if any is used) to re-validate with the new custom or internal value.

events.name: KeyDown

events.name: KeyUp
events.summary: Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.

events.name: Blur
events.summary: The blur event fires when an element has lost focus.

events.name: OnFocus

events.name: FocusOut
events.summary: Occurs when the input box loses focus.

events.name: CustomValidationValue
events.summary: Used to provide custom validation value on which the validation will be processed with the Validator handler.
events.remarks: Should be used carefully as it's only meant for some special cases when input is used     in a wrapper component, like Autocomplete or SelectList.

methods.name: Focus

methods.name: Revalidate
methods.summary: Forces the Validation (if any is used) to re-validate with the new custom or internal value.

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment

components.summary: $""" The Table component is used for displaying tabular data. """

parameters.name: FullWidth
parameters.summary: Makes the table to fill entire horizontal space.

parameters.name: Striped
parameters.summary: Adds stripes to the table.

parameters.name: Bordered
parameters.summary: Adds borders to all the cells.

parameters.name: Hoverable
parameters.summary: Adds a hover effect when mousing over rows.

parameters.name: Narrow
parameters.summary: Makes the table more compact by cutting cell padding in half.

parameters.name: Borderless
parameters.summary: Makes the table without any borders.

parameters.name: Responsive
parameters.summary: Makes table responsive by adding the horizontal scroll bar.
parameters.remarks: In some cases Dropdown component placed inside of a table marked with Responsive flag might not show dropdown menu properly. To make it work you might need to add some additional CSS rules.

parameters.name: FixedHeader
parameters.summary: Makes table have a fixed header and enables a scrollbar in the table body.

parameters.name: FixedColumns
parameters.summary: Makes table have a fixed set of columns. This will make it so that the table columns could be fixed to the side of the table.

parameters.name: FixedColumnsPositionSync
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether the FixedColumns feature automatically resynchronizes the columns positions when they are added or removed.
parameters.remarks: Enabling this feature may impact performance due to constant recalculations of fixed column positions.

parameters.name: FixedHeaderTableHeight
parameters.summary: Sets the table height when FixedHeader feature is enabled (defaults to 300px).

parameters.name: FixedHeaderTableMaxHeight
parameters.summary: Sets the table max height when FixedHeader feature is enabled (defaults to 300px).

parameters.name: Resizable
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether users can resize Table's columns.

parameters.name: ResizeMode
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether the user can resize on header or columns.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Table.

parameters.name: ResponsiveMode
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the Table's responsive mode.

parameters.name: Draggable
parameters.summary: Indicates whether the element can be dragged.

parameters.name: DragPreventDefault
parameters.summary: Used to prevent the default action for an Drag event.

parameters.name: DragEndPreventDefault
parameters.summary: Used to prevent the default action for an DragEnd event.

parameters.summary: Used to prevent the default action for an DragEnter event.

parameters.summary: Used to prevent the default action for an DragOver event.

parameters.summary: Used to prevent the default action for an Drop event.

events.name: Drag
events.summary: The drag event is fired every few hundred milliseconds as an element or text selection is being dragged by the user.

events.name: DragEnd
events.summary: The DragEnd event is fired when a drag operation is being ended (by releasing a mouse button or hitting the escape key).

events.name: DragEnter
events.summary: The DragEnter event is fired when a dragged element or text selection enters a valid drop target.

events.name: DragLeave
events.summary: The DragLeave event is fired when a dragged element or text selection leaves a valid drop target.

events.name: DragOver
events.summary: The DragOver event is fired when an element or text selection is being dragged over a valid drop target (every few hundred milliseconds).

events.name: DragStart
events.summary: The DragStart event is fired when the user starts dragging an element or text selection.

events.name: Drop
events.summary: The drop event is fired when an element or text selection is dropped on a valid drop target.

events.name: ContextMenu
events.summary: The event is fired when an element or text selection is right clicked to show the context menu.

methods.name: ScrollToPixels
methods.summary: If table has FixedHeader enabled, it will scroll position to the provided pixels.

methods.name: ScrollToRow
methods.summary: If table has FixedHeader enabled, it will scroll position to the provided row.

methods.name: OnDragHandler
methods.summary: Event handler for Drag event callback.

methods.name: OnDragOverHandler
methods.summary: Event handler for DragOver event callback.

parameters.summary: Specifies the custom title content to be rendered inside this TableRowGroup. It has higher priority over the Title parameter.

parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this TableRow.

parameters.name: IndentTableCells
parameters.summary: Specifies a number of Table Cells to Indent on the Group Row.

parameters.summary: Used to prevent the default action for an Drag event.

parameters.name: Classes
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class names for component elements.

parameters.name: Styles
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles for component elements.

parameters.name: ElementId

parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

events.name: ExpandedChanged
events.summary: Defines if the group is expanded.

events.name: Clicked
events.summary: Occurs when the row is clicked.

events.name: DoubleClicked
events.summary: Occurs when the row is double clicked.

events.name: Drag
events.summary: The drag event is fired every few hundred milliseconds as an element or text selection is being dragged by the user.

events.name: DragEnd
events.summary: The DragEnd event is fired when a drag operation is being ended (by releasing a mouse button or hitting the escape key).

events.name: DragEnter
events.summary: The DragEnter event is fired when a dragged element or text selection enters a valid drop target.

events.name: DragLeave
events.summary: The DragLeave event is fired when a dragged element or text selection leaves a valid drop target.

events.name: DragOver
events.summary: The DragOver event is fired when an element or text selection is being dragged over a valid drop target (every few hundred milliseconds).

events.name: DragStart
events.summary: The DragStart event is fired when the user starts dragging an element or text selection.

events.name: Drop
events.summary: The drop event is fired when an element or text selection is dropped on a valid drop target.

events.name: ContextMenu
events.summary: The event is fired when an element or text selection is right clicked to show the context menu.

methods.name: OnDragHandler
methods.summary: Event handler for Drag event callback.

methods.name: OnDragOverHandler
methods.summary: Event handler for DragOver event callback.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents a basic text input control.
       """

parameters.name: Role
parameters.summary: Defines the role of the input text.

parameters.name: InputMode
parameters.summary: Hints at the type of data that might be entered by the user while editing the element or its contents.

parameters.name: EditMask
parameters.summary: A string representing a edit mask expression.

parameters.name: MaskType
parameters.summary: Specify the mask type used by the editor.

parameters.name: MaxLength
parameters.summary: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the input element.

parameters.name: VisibleCharacters
parameters.summary: The size attribute specifies the visible width, in characters, of an input element. See w3schools.com.

parameters.name: Immediate
parameters.summary: If true the text in will be changed after each key press.
parameters.remarks: Note that setting this will override global settings in Immediate.

parameters.name: Debounce
parameters.summary: If true the entered text will be slightly delayed before submitting it to the internal value.

parameters.name: DebounceInterval
parameters.summary: Interval in milliseconds that entered text will be delayed from submitting to the internal value.

parameters.name: Placeholder
parameters.summary: Sets the placeholder for the empty text.

parameters.name: Plaintext
parameters.summary: Sets the class to remove the default form field styling and preserve the correct margin and padding.

parameters.name: Color
parameters.summary: Sets the input text color.

parameters.name: Intent
parameters.summary: Sets the input text intent.

parameters.name: Pattern
parameters.summary: The pattern attribute specifies a regular expression that the input element's value is checked against on form validation.

parameters.name: AriaInvalid
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-invalid attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides the validation-derived aria-invalid state.

parameters.name: AriaDescribedBy
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-describedby attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides help and validation message ids generated by Field and Validation.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the value inside the input field.

parameters.name: ValueExpression
parameters.summary: Gets or sets an expression that identifies the input value.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.summary: Sets the size of the input control.

parameters.name: ReadOnly
parameters.summary: Add the readonly boolean attribute on an input to prevent modification of the input’s value.

parameters.name: Disabled
parameters.summary: Add the disabled boolean attribute on an input to prevent user interactions and make it appear lighter.

parameters.name: Autofocus
parameters.summary: Set's the focus to the component after the rendering is done.

parameters.name: Feedback
parameters.summary: Placeholder for validation messages.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Input.

parameters.name: TabIndex
parameters.summary: If defined, indicates that its element can be focused and can participates in sequential keyboard navigation.

parameters.name: Classes
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class names for component elements.

parameters.name: Styles
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles for component elements.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Flex

parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

events.name: ValueChanged
events.summary: Occurs after value has changed.

events.name: KeyDown
events.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed down while the control has focus.

events.name: KeyPress
events.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

events.name: KeyUp
events.summary: Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.

events.name: Blur
events.summary: The blur event fires when an element has lost focus.

events.name: OnFocus
events.summary: Occurs when the input box gains or loses focus.

events.name: FocusIn
events.summary: Occurs when the input box gains focus.

events.name: FocusOut
events.summary: Occurs when the input box loses focus.

events.name: CustomValidationValue
events.summary: Used to provide custom validation value on which the validation will be processed with the Validator handler.
events.remarks: Should be used carefully as it's only meant for some special cases when input is used     in a wrapper component, like Autocomplete or SelectList.

methods.name: Select
methods.summary: Select all text in the underline component.

methods.name: Focus
methods.summary: Sets the focus on the underline element.

methods.name: Revalidate
methods.summary: Forces the Validation (if any is used) to re-validate with the new custom or internal value.

$"""
       An editor that displays a time value and allows a user to edit the value.
       """

parameters.name: Min
parameters.summary: The earliest time to accept.

parameters.name: Max
parameters.summary: The latest time to accept.

parameters.name: Step
parameters.summary: The step attribute specifies the legal number intervals for seconds or milliseconds in a time field (does not apply for hours or minutes).          Example: if step=\"2\", legal numbers could be 0, 2, 4, etc.
parameters.remarks: The step attribute is often used together with the max and min attributes to create a range of legal values.

parameters.name: Placeholder
parameters.summary: Sets the placeholder for the empty text.

parameters.summary: Sets the class to remove the default form field styling and preserve the correct margin and padding.

parameters.name: Intent
parameters.summary: Sets the input text intent.

parameters.summary: The pattern attribute specifies a regular expression that the input element's value is checked against on form validation.

parameters.name: AriaInvalid
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-invalid attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides the validation-derived aria-invalid state.

parameters.name: AriaDescribedBy
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-describedby attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides help and validation message ids generated by Field and Validation.

parameters.name: Value

parameters.summary: Gets or sets the tooltip location relative to its component.

parameters.summary: Force the multiline display.

parameters.summary: Always show tooltip, instead of just when hovering over the element.

parameters.summary: Gets or sets the tooltip arrow visibility.

parameters.name: Inline
parameters.summary: Force inline block instead of trying to detect the element block.

parameters.summary: Makes the tooltip fade transition.

parameters.summary: Duration in ms of the fade transition animation.

parameters.summary: Which element the trigger event listeners are applied to (instead of the reference element).

parameters.summary: Specifies the z-index CSS on the root popper node.

parameters.name: Interactive
parameters.summary: Determines if the tooltip has interactive content inside of it, so that it can be hovered over and clicked inside without hiding.

parameters.name: AppendTo
parameters.summary: The element to append the tooltip to. If Interactive = true, the default behavior is appendTo: \"parent\".

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Tooltip.

parameters.name: ShowDelay

components.summary:
$"""
       Container for input component that can check for different kind of validations.
       """

parameters.name: Status
parameters.summary: Gets the last received validation status.

parameters.name: UsePattern
parameters.summary: Forces validation to use regex pattern matching instead of default validator handler.

parameters.name: HandlerType
parameters.summary: Forces the custom validation handler to be used while validating the values.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Validation.

events.name: StatusChanged
events.summary: Occurs each time that validation status changed.

events.name: Validator
events.summary: Gets the validator handler attached to this validation.

events.name: AsyncValidator
events.summary: Gets the asynchronous validator handler attached to this validation.

events.name: MessageLocalizer
events.summary: Overrides the message that is going to be shown on the ValidationError or ValidationSuccess.

methods.name: InitializeInput
methods.summary: Initializes the input component with the specified validation input. It performs an initial validation     if the mode is set to auto validation and validation on load is enabled.
methods.remarks: This method sets the input component and, based on the configuration, may asynchronously validate     the component's validation value. It also marks the component as initialized.

methods.name: InitializeInputPattern
methods.summary: Initializes or updates the input validation pattern. If the pattern string changes,     a new regex pattern is created, and the input is re-validated if applicable.
methods.remarks: This method optimizes performance by avoiding re-instantiation of the regex pattern if it has not changed.     It ensures that validation is only re-triggered if the component has been initialized and validation conditions are met.

methods.name: InitializeInputExpression
methods.summary: Initializes or updates the input based on a specified expression. This is primarily used for data-annotation validation.
methods.remarks: This method is designed to work with models and edit contexts, allowing for dynamic validation based on expressions.     It ensures that validation is only re-triggered if the component has been initialized and validation conditions are met.

methods.name: NotifyInputChanged
methods.summary: Notifies that an input's value has changed and optionally re-validates the input.
methods.remarks: If the edit context is set and a field identifier has been established, this method notifies the edit context     of the field change. It then conditionally triggers validation based on the component's mode.

methods.name: Validate
methods.summary: Runs the validation process.

methods.name: Validate
methods.summary: Runs the validation process.

methods.name: ValidateAsync
methods.summary: Runs the asynchronous validation process based on the last available value.

methods.name: ValidateAsync
methods.summary: Runs the asynchronous validation process.

methods.name: RetriggerValidation
methods.summary: Runs the asynchronous validation process using the current input value. Can be used to manually retrigger validation.

methods.name: Clear
methods.summary: Clears the validation status.

methods.name: NotifyValidationStarted
methods.summary: Notifies the validation that validation process has being activated.

methods.name: NotifyValidationStatusChanged
methods.summary: Notifies the validation with the new status and messages.

components.summary: $""" Placeholder for the Validation error message. """

parameters.name: Multiline
parameters.summary: If true, shows the multiline error messages.

parameters.name: Tooltip
parameters.summary: If true, shows the tooltip instead of label.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this ValidationError.
