components.summary: $""" Container for multiple validations and an EditContext. """

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.summary: Defines the validation mode for validations inside of this container.

parameters.name: ValidateOnLoad
parameters.summary: If set to true, and Mode is set to Auto, validation will run automatically on page load.
parameters.remarks: When validation is placed inside of modal dialog, the behavior is a little different. Modals are by definition always loaded and are always present in the DOM so no loading is ever happening again after the page that contains the modal is first initialized. Their visibility is controlled by display: none; To workaround this, the actual \"first load\" for modals can be done by re-initializing Model parameter.

parameters.name: EditContext
parameters.summary: Supplies the edit context explicitly. If using this parameter, do not also supply Model, since the model value will be taken from the EditContext.Model property.

parameters.name: Model
parameters.summary: Specifies the top-level model object for the form. An edit context will be constructed for this model. If using this parameter, do not also supply a value for EditContext.

parameters.name: MissingFieldsErrorMessage
parameters.summary: Message that will be displayed if any of the validations does not have defined error message.

parameters.name: HandlerType
parameters.summary: Defines the default handler type that will be used by the validation, unless it is overriden by HandlerType property.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Validations.

events.name: ValidatedAll
events.summary: Event is fired only after all of the validation are successful.

events.name: StatusChanged
events.summary: Event is fired whenever there is a change in validation status.

events.name: FailedValidationsChanged
events.summary: Event is fired whenever the failed validation messages change.

methods.name: ValidateAll
methods.summary: Asynchronously runs the validation process for all validations and returns false if any is failed.

methods.name: ClearAll
methods.summary: Clears all validation statuses.

methods.name: NotifyValidationInitialized
methods.summary: Notifies the validation system that a new validation component has been initialized and adds it to the list of validations if not already present.

methods.name: NotifyValidationRemoved
methods.summary: Notifies the validation system that a validation component is being removed and removes it from the list of validations if present.

methods.name: NotifyValidationStatusChanged
methods.summary: Notifies the validation system that the status of a validation component has changed. This method handles the logic for updating the overall validation status based on the mode (Auto or Manual) and the current validation results.
methods.remarks: In Auto mode, this method triggers the aggregation of validation results and potentially raises a status changed event.     It is designed to minimize the number of status changed events by aggregating validation results.     Special consideration is needed to ensure that the status changed event is raised only once per validation cycle,     even if multiple validations fail.

methods.name: RetriggerValidation
methods.summary: Retriggers validations that match the given FieldIdentifier instances.

methods.name: RetriggerValidation
methods.summary: Retriggers validations for the specified model fields.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents a large, prominent display heading, equivalent to the display-1 style.
       """

parameters.name: Size
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the display heading size.

parameters.name: AlternativeTagName
parameters.summary: Defines the alternative tag name for the heading element. Default is set to h1.

parameters.name: Italic
parameters.summary: Italicize text if set to true.

parameters.name: CopyToClipboard
parameters.summary: If true, the content of the component will be copied to clipboard on click event.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this component.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

parameters.name: ValueExpression
parameters.summary: Gets or sets an expression that identifies the input value.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.summary: Sets the size of the input control.

parameters.name: ReadOnly
parameters.summary: Add the readonly boolean attribute on an input to prevent modification of the input’s value.

parameters.name: Disabled
parameters.summary: Add the disabled boolean attribute on an input to prevent user interactions and make it appear lighter.

parameters.name: Autofocus
parameters.summary: Set's the focus to the component after the rendering is done.

parameters.name: Feedback
parameters.summary: Placeholder for validation messages.

parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this NumericEdit.

parameters.summary: Custom CSS class names for component elements.

parameters.name: Styles

parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding

parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

components.summary: $""" Runs animations for any content places inside of Animate. component. """

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the animate element id.

parameters.name: Animation
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the animation effect.
parameters.remarks: The list of all supported animations can be found in Animations class.

parameters.name: Easing
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the easing effect.
parameters.remarks: The list of all supported easings can be found in Easings class.

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.summary: Gets os sets the total duration of the animation.
parameters.remarks: Values from 0 to 3000, with step 50ms.

parameters.name: DurationMilliseconds
parameters.summary: Gets os sets the total duration of the animation, in milliseconds.
parameters.remarks: Values from 0 to 3000, with step 50ms.

parameters.name: Delay
parameters.summary: Gets os sets the delay of the animation before it runs automatically, or manually.
parameters.remarks: Values from 0 to 3000, with step 50ms.

parameters.name: DelayMilliseconds
parameters.summary: Gets os sets the delay in milliseconds of the animation before it runs automatically, or manually.
parameters.remarks: Values from 0 to 3000, with step 50ms.

parameters.name: Mirror
parameters.summary: Whether elements should animate out while scrolling past them.

parameters.name: Once
parameters.summary: Whether animation should happen only once - while scrolling down.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.summary: Shifts the trigger point of the animation.

parameters.name: Anchor
parameters.summary: Element whose offset will be used to trigger animation instead of an actual one.

parameters.name: AnchorPlacement
parameters.summary: Defines which position of the element regarding to window should trigger the animation.

parameters.name: OptionsName
parameters.summary: Defines the custom name of the options to get from the configuration.

parameters.name: Options
parameters.summary: Defines the animate options.

parameters.name: Auto
parameters.summary: True if the animation will be executed automatically. Otherwise if false it needs to be run manually with Run method.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures all the custom attribute that are not part of Animate component.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Animate.

methods.name: Run
methods.summary: Runs the animation manually.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents JavaScript options for configuring a reCAPTCHA component.
       """

parameters.name: SiteKey
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the site key provided by reCAPTCHA for authentication and validation.

parameters.name: Theme
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the theme of the reCAPTCHA widget (e.g., \"light\" or \"dark\").

parameters.name: Size
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the size of the reCAPTCHA widget (e.g., \"normal\", \"compact\", or \"invisible\").

parameters.name: Badge

methods.name: Clear
methods.summary: Clears all the labels and data from the chart.

methods.name: AddLabels
methods.summary: Adds a new label to the chart.

methods.name: AddDataSet
methods.summary: Adds a new dataset to the chart.

methods.name: RemoveDataSet
methods.summary: Removed the dataset at the specified index.

methods.name: SetData
methods.summary: Sets the new data point(s) to the specified dataset.

methods.name: AddData
methods.summary: Adds the new data point(s) to the specified dataset.

methods.name: AddDatasetsAndUpdate
methods.summary: Adds new datasets and then update the chart.

methods.name: AddLabelsDatasetsAndUpdate
methods.summary: Adds new set of labels and datasets and then update the chart.

methods.name: ShiftLabel
methods.summary: Removes the oldest label.

methods.name: ShiftData
methods.summary: Removes the oldest data point from the specified dataset.

methods.name: PopLabel
methods.summary: Removes the newest label.

methods.name: PopData
methods.summary: Removes the newest data point from the specified dataset.

methods.name: SetOptions
methods.summary: Sets the chart's options manually. Must call Update after making this call.  If the options changes AspectRatio must also call Resize after Update.

methods.name: SetOptionsObject
methods.summary: Sets the chart's OptionsObject manually. Must call Update after manging this call. If the options changes AspectRatio must also call Resize after Update.

methods.name: Resize
methods.summary: Manually resize the canvas element. This is run each time the canvas container is resized,      but you can call this method manually if you change the size of the canvas nodes container element.      Should also be called when updating the aspect ratio.

methods.name: ChangeType
methods.summary: Destroy the current chart instance and recreates it by using the same data and options.

methods.name: Destroy
methods.summary: Destroys the chart instance. Calling this method should generally dispose of any chart resources.

methods.name: Update
methods.summary: Update and redraw the chart.

methods.name: NotifyPluginInitialized
methods.summary: Notifies the chart that it contains the plugin.

methods.name: NotifyPluginRemoved
methods.summary: Notifies the chart that it should remove the plugin. Freeing the reference.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary:
A position can be set in 2 different values types:

'start', 'center', 'end' which are defining where the label will be locateda string, in percentage format 'number%', is representing the percentage on the size where the label will be located

If this value is a string (possible options are 'start', 'center', 'end' or a string in percentage format), it is applied to vertical and horizontal position in the box.

If this value is an object, the x property defines the horizontal alignment in the label, with respect to the selected point. Similarly, the y property defines the vertical alignment in the label, with respect to the selected point. Possible options for both properties are 'start', 'center', 'end', a string in percentage format. Omitted property have value of the default, 'center'.

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.summary: Duration of the chart in milliseconds (how much time of data it will show).

parameters.name: Ttl
parameters.summary: Duration of the data to be kept in milliseconds. If not set, old data will be automatically deleted as it disappears off the chart.

parameters.name: Refresh
parameters.summary: Refresh interval of data in milliseconds. onRefresh callback function will be called at this interval.

parameters.name: Delay
parameters.summary: Delay added to the chart in milliseconds so that upcoming values are known before lines are plotted. This makes the chart look like a continual stream rather than very jumpy on the right hand side. Specify the maximum expected delay.

parameters.name: FrameRate
parameters.summary: Frequency at which the chart is drawn on a display (frames per second). This option can be set at chart level but not at axis level. Decrease this value to save CPU power (https://github.com/nagix/chartjs-plugin-streaming#lowering-cpu-usage).

parameters.name: Pause
parameters.summary: If set to true, scrolling stops. Note that onRefresh callback is called even when this is set to true.

components.summary:

       This plugin (computes and) draws a linear trend line in the chart.     This plugin works with @ref and call of the AddTrendLineOptions method after     dataset has been added and chart.Update has been called
       """

parameters.name: ElementId

parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background

parameters.name: Shadow

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

components.summary:
$"""
       The autocomplete is a normal text input enhanced by a panel of suggested options.
       """

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.summary: Defines the method by which the search will be done.

parameters.name: MinSearchLength
parameters.summary: The minimum number of characters a user must type before a search is performed. Set this to 0 to make the Autocomplete function like a dropdown.

parameters.name: MaxEntryLength
parameters.summary: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the input element.

parameters.name: MaxMenuHeight
parameters.summary: Sets the maximum height of the dropdown menu.

parameters.name: Placeholder
parameters.summary: Sets the placeholder for the empty search.

parameters.name: Data
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the autocomplete data-source.

parameters.name: FreeTyping
parameters.summary: Allows the value to not be on the data source. The value will be bound to the SelectedText

parameters.name: SelectedValue
parameters.summary: Currently selected item value.

parameters.name: SelectedValueExpression
parameters.summary: Gets or sets an expression that identifies the selected value.

parameters.name: SelectedText
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected item text.

parameters.name: Search
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected item text.

parameters.name: HighlightSearch
parameters.summary: If true, the searched text will be highlighted in the dropdown list items based on Search value.

parameters.name: SearchBackground
parameters.summary: Defines the background color of the search field.

parameters.name: SearchTextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the search field.

parameters.name: SearchClass
parameters.summary: Defines class for search field.

parameters.name: SearchStyle
parameters.summary: Defines style for search field.

parameters.name: SelectedValues
parameters.summary: Currently selected items values.     Used when multiple selection is set.

parameters.name: SelectedValuesExpression
parameters.summary: Gets or sets an expression that identifies the selected values.     Used when multiple selection is set.

parameters.name: SelectedTexts
parameters.summary: Currently selected items texts.     Used when multiple selection is set.

parameters.name: Immediate
parameters.summary: If true the text in will be changed after each key press.
parameters.remarks: Note that setting this will override global settings in Immediate.

parameters.name: Debounce
parameters.summary: If true the entered text will be slightly delayed before submitting it to the internal value.

parameters.name: DebounceInterval
parameters.summary: Interval in milliseconds that entered text will be delayed from submitting to the internal value.

parameters.name: NotFoundTemplate
parameters.summary: Specifies the not found template to be rendered inside this Autocomplete when no data is found.

parameters.name: FreeTypingNotFoundTemplate
parameters.summary: Specifies the not found content to be rendered inside this Autocomplete when no data is found and FreeTyping is enabled.

parameters.name: MultipleBadgeColor
parameters.summary: Sets the Badge color for the multiple selection values. Used when multiple selection is set.

parameters.name: MultipleDisabledBadgeColor
parameters.summary: Sets the disabled Badge color for the multiple selection values. Used when multiple selection is set.

parameters.name: ItemContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the item content to be rendered inside each dropdown item.

parameters.name: CloseOnSelection
parameters.summary: Specifies whether Autocomplete dropdown closes on selection. This is only evaluated when multiple selection is set. Defauls to true.

parameters.name: SuggestSelectedItems
parameters.summary: Suggests already selected option(s) when presenting the options.

parameters.name: ConfirmKey
parameters.summary:
Gets or sets an array of the keyboard pressed values for the ConfirmKey. If this is null or empty, there will be no confirmation key.

Defauls to: { \"Enter\", \"NumpadEnter\", \"Tab\" }.
parameters.remarks: If the value has a printed representation, this attribute's value is the same as the char attribute.     Otherwise, it's one of the key value strings specified in 'Key values'.

parameters.name: AutoPreSelect
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether Autocomplete auto preselects the first item displayed on the dropdown. Defauls to true.

parameters.name: SelectionMode
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the Autocomplete Selection Mode.

parameters.name: AutoSelectFirstItem
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the whether first item in the list should be selected

parameters.name: Virtualize
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether the Autocomplete will use the Virtualize functionality.

parameters.name: TotalItems
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the total number of items. Used only when ReadData and Virtualize is used to load the data.
parameters.remarks: This field must be set only when ReadData and Virtualize is used to load the data.

parameters.name: TagTemplate
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered for each tag (multiple selected item).

parameters.name: PositionStrategy
parameters.summary: Defines the positioning strategy of the dropdown menu as a 'floating' element.

parameters.name: CloseParentDropdowns
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether parent dropdown menus should be closed when this component is activated.
parameters.remarks: Set this property to  to automatically close any open parent dropdowns     when the component is triggered. This can be useful for ensuring only one dropdown is open at a time in nested     menu scenarios.

parameters.name: AriaInvalid
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-invalid attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides the validation-derived aria-invalid state.

parameters.name: AriaDescribedBy
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-describedby attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides help and validation message ids generated by Field and Validation.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the value inside the input field.

parameters.name: ValueExpression
parameters.summary: Gets or sets an expression that identifies the input value.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.summary: Sets the size of the input control.

parameters.name: ReadOnly
parameters.summary: Add the readonly boolean attribute on an input to prevent modification of the input’s value.

parameters.name: Disabled
parameters.summary: Add the disabled boolean attribute on an input to prevent user interactions and make it appear lighter.

parameters.name: Autofocus
parameters.summary: Set's the focus to the component after the rendering is done.

parameters.name: Feedback
parameters.summary: Placeholder for validation messages.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Autocomplete.

parameters.name: TabIndex
parameters.summary: If defined, indicates that its element can be focused and can participates in sequential keyboard navigation.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents a component that allows transferring items between two list panes.
       """

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.summary: Defines how the list groups behave (e.g., selectable, static).

parameters.name: SelectionMode
parameters.summary: Defines how many items can be selected at once in each list.

parameters.name: ShowMoveAll
parameters.summary: Determines whether the \"Move All\" buttons are visible between lists.

parameters.name: MoveButtonsColor
parameters.summary: Specifies the color of the move and \"Move All\" buttons.

parameters.name: Scrollable
parameters.summary: Enables a vertical scrollbar when the list exceeds the maximum height.

parameters.name: MaxHeight
parameters.summary: Sets the maximum height of each list pane. Defaults to 300px.

parameters.name: ItemStartTemplate
parameters.summary: Defines the template used to render items in the start (left) list.

parameters.name: ItemEndTemplate
parameters.summary: Defines the template used to render items in the end (right) list.

parameters.name: Items
parameters.summary: Provides the complete collection of items managed by the transfer list.

parameters.name: ItemsStart
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the items displayed in the start (left) list.

parameters.name: ItemsEnd
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the items displayed in the end (right) list.

parameters.name: SelectedItemStart
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected item in the start (left) list.

parameters.name: SelectedItemEnd
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected item in the end (right) list.

parameters.name: SelectedItemsStart
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected items in the start (left) list for multi-selection mode.

parameters.name: SelectedItemsEnd
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected items in the end (right) list for multi-selection mode.

events.name: ValueField
events.summary: Function used to extract the unique value field from an item.

events.name: TextField
events.summary: Function used to extract the display text field from an item.

events.name: CanMoveToStart
events.summary: Determines whether a specific item can be moved to the start (left) list.

events.name: CanMoveToEnd
events.summary: Determines whether a specific item can be moved to the end (right) list.

events.name: ItemsStartChanged
events.summary: Event callback triggered when the start list items change.

events.name: ItemsEndChanged
events.summary: Event callback triggered when the end list items change.

events.name: SelectedItemStartChanged
events.summary: Event callback triggered when the selected item in the start list changes.

events.name: SelectedItemEndChanged
events.summary: Event callback triggered when the selected item in the end list changes.

events.name: SelectedItemsStartChanged
events.summary: Event callback triggered when the selected items in the start list change.

events.name: SelectedItemsEndChanged
events.summary: Event callback triggered when the selected items in the end list change.

methods.name: MoveSelectedEnd
methods.summary: Moves the currently selected item(s) from the start (left) list to the end (right) list, based on SelectionMode.

methods.name: MoveSelectedStart
methods.summary: Moves the currently selected item(s) from the end (right) list to the start (left) list, based on SelectionMode.

methods.name: MoveAllEnd
methods.summary: Moves all eligible items from the start (left) list to the end (right) list.

methods.name: MoveAllStart
methods.summary: Moves all eligible items from the end (right) list to the start (left) list.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

components.summary:
$"""
       Provides properties for manipulating the layout and presentation of selection grid elements.
       """

parameters.name: Rows
parameters.summary: Indicates the number of the rows.

parameters.name: Columns
parameters.summary: Indicates the number of the columns.

parameters.name: Bordered
parameters.summary: Indicates whether this element is bordered.

parameters.name: Covered
parameters.summary: Indicates whether this element covers its parent element.

components.summary:
$"""
       Provides properties for manipulating the layout and presentation of image elements.
       """

parameters.name: Rotatable
parameters.summary: Indicates whether this element is rotatable.

parameters.name: Scalable
parameters.summary: Indicates whether this element is scalable.

parameters.name: Skewable
parameters.summary: Indicates whether this element is skewable.

parameters.name: Translatable
parameters.summary: Indicates whether this element is translatable.

components.summary:
$"""
       The Cropper selection interface provides properties for manipulating the layout and presentation.
       """

parameters.name: AspectRatio
parameters.summary: Indicates the aspect ratio of the selection, must a positive number.

parameters.name: InitialAspectRatio
parameters.summary: Indicates the initial aspect ratio of the selection, must a positive number.

parameters.name: InitialCoverage
parameters.summary: Indicates the initial coverage of the selection, must a positive number between 0 (0%) and 1 (100%).

parameters.name: Movable
parameters.summary: Indicates whether the selection is movable.

parameters.name: Resizable
parameters.summary: Indicates whether the selection is resizable.

parameters.name: Zoomable
parameters.summary: Indicates whether the selection is zoomable.

parameters.name: Keyboard
parameters.summary: Indicates whether keyboard control is supported.

parameters.name: Outlined
parameters.summary: Indicates whether show the outlined or not.

components.summary:
$"""
       The DataGrid component allows you to display and manage data in a tabular (rows/columns) format.
       """

parameters.name: PopupTitleTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets template for title of popup modal.

parameters.name: PopupSize
parameters.summary: Defines the size of popup dialog.

parameters.name: Data
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the datagrid data-source.

parameters.name: AggregateData
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the calculated aggregate data.
parameters.remarks: Used only in manual read mode along with the ReadData handler.

parameters.name: TotalItems
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the total number of items. Used only when ReadData is used to load the data.
parameters.remarks: This field must be set only when ReadData is used to load the data.

parameters.name: UseInternalEditing
parameters.summary: Specifies the behaviour of datagrid editing.
parameters.remarks: Disabling this option will send all changes to the RowInserted and RowUpdated but nothing will be saved unless the user manually update the item values.

parameters.name: Editable
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether users can edit datagrid rows.

parameters.name: Virtualize
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether the datagrid will use the Virtualize functionality.

parameters.name: VirtualizeOptions
parameters.summary: Gets or sets Virtualize options when using the Virtualize functionality.

parameters.name: PagerOptions
parameters.summary: Gets or sets Pager options.

parameters.name: Resizable
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether users can resize datagrid columns.

parameters.name: ResizeMode
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether the user can resize on header or columns.

parameters.name: Sortable
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether end-users can sort data by the column's values.

parameters.name: SortMode
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether the user can sort only by one column or by multiple.

parameters.name: Filterable
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether users can filter rows by its cell values.

parameters.name: FilterMode
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the filter mode.

parameters.name: Groupable
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether the data will be grouped. Column groups need to be configured.

parameters.name: ShowGrouping
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether user can see and edit column grouping.

parameters.name: ShowCaptions
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether user can see a column captions.

parameters.name: ShowPager
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether users can navigate datagrid by using pagination controls.

parameters.name: PagerPosition
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the position of the pager.

parameters.name: AggregateRowPosition
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the position of the aggregate row.

parameters.name: ShowPageSizes
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether users can adjust the page size of the datagrid.

parameters.name: PageSizes
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the chooseable page sizes of the datagrid.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the current page number.

parameters.name: EmptyTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of table body for empty DisplayData.

parameters.name: EmptyFilterTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of table body for the empty filter DisplayData.

parameters.name: EmptyCellTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of cell body for empty DisplayData.

parameters.name: LoadingTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of table body for handle ReadData.

parameters.name: ButtonRowTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of button row of pager.

parameters.name: ColumnChooserTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of column chooser of pager.

parameters.name: FirstPageButtonTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of first button of pager.

parameters.name: LastPageButtonTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of last button of pager.

parameters.name: PreviousPageButtonTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of previous button of pager.

parameters.name: NextPageButtonTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of next button of pager.

parameters.name: PageButtonTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of page buttons of pager.

parameters.name: ItemsPerPageTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of items per page of grid.

parameters.name: TotalItemsShortTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of total items grid for small devices.

parameters.name: TotalItemsTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of total items grid.

parameters.name: PageSelectorTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of the page selector. The selector is only displayed under the tablets breakpoint. You will have to construct it using the provided pagination context.

parameters.name: PageSizesTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets content of the page sizes selector. You will have to construct it using the provided pagination context.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of items for each page.

parameters.name: MaxPaginationLinks
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of visible pagination links. It has to be odd for well look.

parameters.name: FilterMethod
parameters.summary: Defines the filter method to be applied when filtering data in the grid.

parameters.name: SelectedRow
parameters.summary: Gets or sets currently selected row.

parameters.name: SelectedRows
parameters.summary: Gets or sets currently selected rows.

parameters.name: SelectionMode
parameters.summary: Gets or sets current selection mode.

parameters.name: RowContextMenuPreventDefault
parameters.summary: Used to prevent the default action for an RowContextMenu event.

parameters.name: EditMode
parameters.summary: Specifies the grid editing modes.

parameters.name: CommandMode
parameters.summary: Specifies the grid command mode.

parameters.name: DetailRowTemplate
parameters.summary: Template for displaying detail or nested row.

parameters.name: Striped
parameters.summary: Adds stripes to the table.

parameters.name: Bordered
parameters.summary: Adds borders to all the cells.

parameters.name: Borderless
parameters.summary: Makes the table without any borders.

parameters.name: Hoverable
parameters.summary: Adds a hover effect when mousing over rows.

parameters.name: Narrow
parameters.summary: Makes the table more compact by cutting cell padding in half.

parameters.name: Responsive
parameters.summary: Makes table responsive by adding the horizontal scroll bar.
parameters.remarks: In some cases Dropdown component placed inside of a table marked with Responsive flag might not show dropdown menu properly. To make it work you might need to add some additional CSS rules.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom css classname.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom html style.

parameters.name: Classes
parameters.summary: Supplies additional CSS classes for DataGrid elements.

parameters.name: Styles
parameters.summary: Supplies additional CSS styles for DataGrid elements.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Defines the element margin spacing.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Defines the element padding spacing.

parameters.name: CustomFilter
parameters.summary: Handler for custom filtering on datagrid item.

parameters.name: HeaderRowStyling
parameters.summary: Custom styles for header row.

parameters.name: FilterRowStyling
parameters.summary: Custom styles for filter row.

parameters.name: AggregateRowStyling
parameters.summary: Custom styles for aggregate row.

parameters.name: DataGridColumns
parameters.summary: Template for holding the datagrid columns.

parameters.name: DataGridAggregates
parameters.summary: Template for holding the datagrid aggregate columns.

parameters.name: UseValidation
parameters.summary: If true, DataGrid will use validation when editing the fields.

parameters.name: ShowValidationFeedback
parameters.summary: If true, shows feedbacks for all validations.

parameters.name: ShowValidationsSummary
parameters.summary: If true, shows summary for all validations.

parameters.name: ValidationsSummaryLabel
parameters.summary: Label for validations summary.

parameters.name: ValidationsSummaryErrors
parameters.summary: List of custom error messages for the validations summary.

parameters.name: ValidationsHandlerType
parameters.summary: Defines the default handler type that will be used by the validation, unless it is overriden by HandlerType property.

parameters.name: Localizers
parameters.summary: Custom localizer handlers to override default DataGrid localization.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this DataGrid.

parameters.name: FixedHeader
parameters.summary: Makes Datagrid have a fixed header and enabling a scrollbar in the Datagrid body.

parameters.name: FixedColumns
parameters.summary: Makes Datagrid have a fixed set of columns. This will make it so that the table columns could be fixed to the side of the table.

parameters.name: FixedColumnsPositionSync
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether the FixedColumns feature automatically resynchronizes the columns positions when they are added or removed.
parameters.remarks: Enabling this feature may impact performance due to constant recalculations of fixed column positions.

parameters.name: FixedHeaderDataGridHeight
parameters.summary: Sets the Datagrid height when FixedHeader feature is enabled (defaults to 500px).

parameters.name: FixedHeaderDataGridMaxHeight
parameters.summary: Sets the Datagrid max height when FixedHeader feature is enabled (defaults to 500px).

parameters.name: HeaderThemeContrast
parameters.summary: Sets the Datagrid's table header ThemeContrast.

parameters.name: SubmitFormOnEnter
parameters.summary: If true, the edit form will have the Save button as type=\"submit\", and it will react to Enter keys being pressed.

parameters.name: DetailRowStartsVisible
parameters.summary: Controls whether DetailRow will start visible if DetailRowTemplate is set. DetailRowTrigger will be evaluated if set.

parameters.name: ShowDefaultSortIcon
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether default sort icon should display.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures all the custom attribute that are not part of Blazorise component.

parameters.name: RowOverlayTemplate
parameters.summary: Template for mouse hover overlay display formatting.

parameters.name: RowOverlayPosition
parameters.summary: Defines the position of the row overlay.

parameters.name: RowOverlayBackground
parameters.summary: Defines the background of the row overlay.

parameters.name: ShowHeaderGroupCaptions
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether user can see defined header group captions.

parameters.name: HeaderGroupCaptionTemplate
parameters.summary:
Template for header group caption.

Suggested usage: rendering content conditionally according to the defined HeaderGroupCaption

parameters.name: FilterMenuTemplate
parameters.summary: Template for the filter column. When filter mode is set to DataGridFilterMode.Menu, this template will be used to render the filter content.

parameters.name: BatchEdit
parameters.summary: Whether the DataGrid will be in batch edit mode. This will make it so every change will only be saved when Save is called.

parameters.name: ShowColumnChooser
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether the column chooser is visible.

parameters.name: AutoGenerateColumns
parameters.summary:
Gets or sets whether the DataGrid should automatically generate columns.

Columns will only be automatically generated if no columns have been provided.

Defaults to true.

parameters.name: EditModeOptions
parameters.summary: Gets or sets DataGridEditMode options, allowing to customize how the edit mode will work.

parameters.name: NavigationMode
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the DataGrid navigation mode, allowing to control the navigation via keyboard.

parameters.name: ResponsiveMode
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the Table's responsive mode.

parameters.name: SelectedCell
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected cell in the data grid.
parameters.remarks: This property is only applicable when NavigationMode is set to Cell.

parameters.name: Caption
parameters.summary: Defines the caption of the table, usually used to describe the table content.

parameters.name: CaptionSide
parameters.summary: Defines the placement of the Caption element.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the datagrid element id.

events.name: PopupClosing
events.summary: Occurs before the popup dialog is closed.

events.name: FilteredDataChanged
events.summary: Raises an event every time that filtered data is refreshed.

events.name: GroupBy
events.summary: Gets or sets a custom GroupBy function. Groupable needs to be active. If this is defined at the DataGrid level, column grouping will not be considered.

events.name: PageChanged
events.summary: Occurs after the selected page has changed.

events.name: PageSizeChanged
events.summary: Occurs after the PageSize has changed.

events.name: SelectedRowChanged
events.summary: Occurs after the selected row has changed.

events.name: SelectedRowsChanged
events.summary: Occurs after multi selection has changed.

events.name: RowInserting
events.summary: Cancelable event called before the row is inserted.

events.name: RowUpdating
events.summary: Cancelable event called before the row is updated.

events.name: RowRemoving
events.summary: Cancelable event called before the row is removed.

events.name: RowInserted
events.summary: Event called after the row is inserted.

events.name: RowUpdated
events.summary: Event called after the row is updated.

events.name: RowRemoved
events.summary: Event called after the row is removed.

events.name: RowMouseLeave
events.summary: Event called after the mouse leaves the row.

events.name: RowMouseOver
events.summary: Event called after the mouse is over the row.

events.name: RowClicked
events.summary: Event called after the row is clicked.

events.name: RowDoubleClicked
events.summary: Event called after the row is double clicked.

events.name: RowContextMenu
events.summary: Event called after the row has requested a context menu.

events.name: ReadData
events.summary: Event handler used to load data manually based on the current page and filter data settings.

events.name: SortChanged
events.summary: Occurs after the sort direction of a single column has changed.

events.name: DetailRowTrigger
events.summary: A trigger function used to handle the visibility of detail row.

events.name: RowSelectable
events.summary: Handles the selection of the DataGrid row.     If not set it will default to always true.

events.name: RowHoverCursor
events.summary: Handles the selection of the cursor for a hovered row. If not set, Default will be used.

events.name: NewItemDefaultSetter
events.summary: Function, that is called, when a new item is created for inserting new entry.

events.name: NewItemCreator
events.summary: Function that, if set, is called to create new instance of an item. If left null a default constructor will be used.

events.name: ValidationItemCreator
events.summary: Function that, if set, is called to create a validation instance of an item that it's used as a separate instance for Datagrid's internal processing of validation. If left null, Datagrid will try to use it's own implementation to instantiate.

events.name: EditItemCreator
events.summary: Function that, if set, is called to create a instance of the selected item to edit. If left null the selected item will be used.

events.name: CloneItemCreator
events.summary: Function that, if set, is called to clone an instance of the saving item. If left null the built-in DeepClone method will be used.

events.name: RowStyling
events.summary: Custom handler for each row in the datagrid.

events.name: SelectedRowStyling
events.summary: Custom handler for currently selected row.

events.name: RowBatchEditStyling
events.summary: Custom handler for the row that has batch edit changes.

events.name: BatchSaving
events.summary: Cancelable event before batch edit is saved.

events.name: BatchSaved
events.summary: Event called after the batch edit is saved.

events.name: BatchChange
events.summary: Event called after a batch change is made.

events.name: CellStyling
events.summary: Custom handler for the cell styling.

events.name: SelectedCellStyling
events.summary: Custom handler for the selected cell styling.

events.name: BatchEditCellStyling
events.summary: Custom handler for the cell styling when the cell has batch edit changes.

events.name: ColumnDisplayingChanged
events.summary: Event called after a column display change is made.

events.name: ColumnDisplayOrderChanged
events.summary: Event called after a column display order change is made.

events.name: SelectedCellChanged
events.summary: Occurs after the selected cell has changed in the data grid.
events.remarks: This event is triggered when NavigationMode is set to Cell, indicating that cell-level navigation is enabled. Make sure to handle this event if you need to respond to cell selection changes.

methods.name: LoadState
methods.summary: Loads the state of the DataGrid.

methods.name: GetState
methods.summary: Gets the current state of the DataGrid.

methods.name: GetColumns
methods.summary: Returns a list of all the columns that are currently associated with this datagrid.

methods.name: GetSortByColumns
methods.summary: Returns a list of all columns currently used to sort this datagrid's data.

methods.name: AddColumn
methods.summary: Links the child column with this datagrid.

methods.name: RemoveColumn
methods.summary:
Removes an existing link of a child column with this datagrid.

Returns: true if item is successfully removed; otherwise, false.

methods.name: RemoveRow
methods.summary: Links the child row with this datagrid.

methods.name: AddAggregate
methods.summary: Links the child column with this datagrid.

methods.name: AddGroupColumn
methods.summary: Adds a new column to grouping.

methods.name: RemoveGroupColumn
methods.summary: Removes a column from grouping.

methods.name: ToggleGroups
methods.summary:
Toggles the specified groups.

For regular single column groups, the group key should be easy to determine, i.e: for a column grouped by Gender the key could be something like : \"Male\"

For complex GroupBy operations, you will need to specify the full group key, i.e: for a group composed of Childrens and Gender, the group key would be something like: \"{ Childrens = 1, Gender = M }\"

GroupedData : DisplayGroupedData | GroupKey: Key

methods.name: ExpandGroups
methods.summary:
Expands the specified groups.

For regular single column groups, the group key should be easy to determine, i.e: for a column grouped by Gender the key could be something like : \"Male\"

For complex GroupBy operations, you will need to specify the full group key, i.e: for a group composed of Childrens and Gender, the group key would be something like: \"{ Childrens = 1, Gender = M }\"

GroupedData : DisplayGroupedData | GroupKey: Key

methods.name: CollapseGroups
methods.summary:
Collapses the specified groups.

For regular single column groups, the group key should be easy to determine, i.e: for a column grouped by Gender the key could be something like : \"Male\"

For complex GroupBy operations, you will need to specify the full group key, i.e: for a group composed of Childrens and Gender, the group key would be something like: \"{ Childrens = 1, Gender = M }\"

GroupedData : DisplayGroupedData | GroupKey: Key

methods.name: ExpandAllGroups
methods.summary: Expands all groups.

methods.name: CollapseAllGroups
methods.summary: Collapses all groups.

methods.name: SetLoading
methods.summary:
Sets the DataGrid into the loading state.

Makes sure to invoke the StateHasChanged method.

methods.name: New
methods.summary: Sets the DataGrid into the New state mode.

methods.name: New
methods.summary: Adds a new item to the DataGrid, either by opening it in edit mode or by adding the batch edit collection,     depending on whether batch editing is enabled.

methods.name: Edit
methods.summary: Sets the DataGrid into the Edit state mode for the specified item.

methods.name: Delete
methods.summary: Deletes the specified item from the Data source.

methods.name: GetBatchEditItemByOriginal
methods.summary: Gets the corresponding batch edit item by the original if it exists.

methods.name: GetBatchEditItemByLastEditItem
methods.summary: Gets the corresponding batch edit item by the last edited item if it exists.

methods.name: Save
methods.summary: Save the internal state of the editing items.

methods.name: ValidateAll
methods.summary: Validates the current edit operation.

methods.name: Cancel
methods.summary: Cancels any edit operation in progress.

methods.name: Select
methods.summary: Selects the specified item.

methods.name: Sort
methods.summary: Sorts the Data for the specified column. Note that Sortable must be enabled to be able to sort!

methods.name: Sort
methods.summary: Sorts the Data for the specified column. Note that Sortable must be enabled to be able to sort!

methods.name: ApplySorting
methods.summary: Applies a new sort to the datagrid using the provided columns, sort order, and sort direction. Replaces the current sorting.
methods.remarks: Note that Sortable and Sortable must be enabled to be able to sort! If more than one column is specified, SortMode must be Multiple

methods.name: ResetDisplayOrder
methods.summary: Resets the display order of all columns to their default state.
methods.remarks: This method sets the internal display order of each column to , effectively clearing any custom display order. If the Columns collection is empty or , the method performs no action.

methods.name: Paginate
methods.summary: Triggers the DataGrid to change data source page.
methods.remarks: Valid  values are:     1-n:    Number of the page.     prev:   Go to first page.     next:   Go to next page.     first:  Go to first page.     last:   Go to last page.

methods.name: ClearFilter
methods.summary: Clears all filters from the grid.

methods.name: ClearFilter
methods.summary: Clears the corresponding column filters.

methods.name: FilterData
methods.summary: Forces the internal DataGrid data to be filtered.
methods.remarks: Keep in mind that this command will always trigger FilteredDataChanged even though not any data is actually changed.

methods.name: UpdateCellEditValue
methods.summary: Updates the cell of the current editing item that matches the .

methods.name: ReadCellEditValue
methods.summary: Reads the cell value of the current editing item that matches the .

methods.name: ToggleDetailRow
methods.summary: Toggles DetailRow while evaluating the DetailRowTrigger if provided. Use to ignore DetailRowTrigger and toggle the DetailRow.

methods.name: ScrollToPixels
methods.summary: If FixedHeader or Virtualize is enabled, it will scroll position to the provided pixels.

methods.name: ScrollToRow
methods.summary: If FixedHeader or Virtualize is enabled, it will scroll position to the provided row.

methods.name: Reload
methods.summary: Triggers the reload of the DataGrid data. Makes sure not to reload if the DataGrid is in a loading state.

methods.name: Refresh
methods.summary: Notifies the DataGrid to refresh.

methods.name: GetRowInfo
methods.summary: No documentation available - no XML comment
methods.remarks: No documentation available - no XML comment

components.summary:
$"""
       No documentation available - no XML comment
       """

parameters.name: Field
parameters.summary: To bind a column to a data source field, set this property to the required data field name.

parameters.name: Aggregate
parameters.summary: Type of aggregate calculation.

parameters.name: DisplayTemplate
parameters.summary: Optional display template for aggregate values.

parameters.name: DisplayFormat
parameters.summary: Defines the format for display value.

parameters.name: DisplayFormatProvider
parameters.summary: Defines the format provider info for display value.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this DataGridAggregate.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the datagrid element id.

events.name: AggregationFunction
events.summary: Aggregation calculation.

methods.name: Sum
methods.summary: Summary of numeric value.

methods.name: Min
methods.summary: Min value of numeric value.

methods.name: Max
methods.summary: Max value of numeric value.

methods.name: Average
methods.summary: Average value of numeric value.

methods.name: Count
methods.summary: Count all values that are not null.

methods.name: TrueCount
methods.summary: Count all boolean values that are true.

methods.name: FalseCount
methods.summary: Count all boolean values that are false.

components.summary:
$"""
       No documentation available - no XML comment
       """

parameters.name: Displaying
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the default visibility of the column.     This parameter is only used as the initial/default state; runtime visibility is managed by column visibility actions.

parameters.name: Caption
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the column's display caption.

parameters.name: CaptionTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the column's display caption template.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.summary: Filter value for this column.

parameters.name: CustomFilter
parameters.summary: Custom filter function used to override internal filtering.

parameters.name: FilterTextAlignment
parameters.summary: Defines the alignment for column filter cell. If not set, it will fallback to the TextAlignment.

parameters.name: FilterTextTransform
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the text transformation for column filter cell. If not set, it will fallback to the TextTransform.

parameters.name: FilterTextDecoration
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the text decoration for column filter cell. If not set, it will fallback to the TextDecoration.

parameters.name: FilterTextWeight
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the text weight for column filter cell. If not set, it will fallback to the TextWeight.

parameters.name: FilterTextOverflow
parameters.summary: Determines how the text will behave when it is larger than a parent container for column filter cell. If not set, it will fallback to the TextOverflow.

parameters.name: FilterTextSize
parameters.summary: Determines the font size of an element for column filter cell. If not set, it will fallback to the TextSize.

parameters.name: FilterVerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Defines the vertical alignment for column filter cell.

parameters.name: FilterDisplay
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior of a filter cell.

parameters.name: FilterFlex
parameters.summary: Specifies the flex utility of a filter cell.

parameters.name: FilterGap
parameters.summary: Specifies the gap utility of a filter cell.

parameters.name: SortDirection
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the column initial sort direction.

parameters.name: SortComparer
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the custom comparer used for sorting the items in this column.      Note that this comparer can only be used with in-memory data.

parameters.name: ReverseSorting
parameters.summary: Gets or sets whether the sort direction will be reversed.

parameters.name: SortDirectionTemplate
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the column's display sort direction template.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Defines the alignment for the table cell.

parameters.name: TextTransform

parameters.name: CellEditOnSingleClick
parameters.summary: When the DataGridEditMode is set to Cell configures whether the cell enters edit mode on single click. Defaults to false.

parameters.summary: When the DataGridEditMode is set to Cell configures whether the cell enters edit mode on double click. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: CellEditSelectTextOnEdit
parameters.summary: When the DataGridEditMode is set to Cell configures whether the text is selected when the cell enters edit mode. Defaults to false.

components.summary: $""" Defines the options for DataGrid virtualize mode. """

parameters.name: DataGridHeight
parameters.summary: Sets the DataGrid height when Virtualize feature is enabled (defaults to 500px).

parameters.name: DataGridMaxHeight
parameters.summary: Sets the DataGrid height when Virtualize feature is enabled (defaults to 500px).

parameters.name: OverscanCount
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines how many additional items will be rendered     before and after the visible region. This help to reduce the frequency of rendering     during scrolling. However, higher values mean that more elements will be present     in the page.

parameters.name: ScrollRowOnEdit
parameters.summary: If DataGrid goes into DataGridEditMode.Inline or DataGridEditMode.Form, scrolls the row to the top.     Defaults to true.

       """

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents JavaScript options for configuring a Lottie animation.
       """

parameters.name: Path
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the file path or URL to the Lottie animation JSON data.

parameters.name: Loop
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the loop configuration for the animation. Determines whether and how the animation loops.

parameters.name: Autoplay
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the animation should start playing automatically.

parameters.name: Renderer
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the renderer type for the animation (e.g., \"svg\", \"canvas\", or \"html\").

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the playback direction of the animation. A value of 1 plays forward, and -1 plays in reverse.

parameters.name: Speed
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the playback speed of the animation. A value of 1 is normal speed, while values greater or less than 1 adjust the speed proportionally.

parameters.name: SendCurrentFrame
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to send the current frame index during playback.

components.summary:
$"""
       Component for acts as a wrapper around the EasyMDE, a markdown editor.
       """

parameters.name: AutoDownloadFontAwesome
parameters.summary: If set to true, force downloads Font Awesome (used for icons). If set to false, prevents downloading.

parameters.name: LineNumbers
parameters.summary: If set to true, enables line numbers in the editor.

parameters.name: LineWrapping
parameters.summary: If set to false, disable line wrapping. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: MinHeight
parameters.summary: Sets the minimum height for the composition area, before it starts auto-growing.     Should be a string containing a valid CSS value like \"500px\". Defaults to \"300px\".

parameters.name: MaxHeight
parameters.summary: Sets fixed height for the composition area. minHeight option will be ignored.     Should be a string containing a valid CSS value like \"500px\". Defaults to undefined.

parameters.name: Placeholder
parameters.summary: If set, displays a custom placeholder message.

parameters.name: TabSize
parameters.summary: If set, customize the tab size. Defaults to 2.

parameters.name: Theme
parameters.summary: Override the theme. Defaults to easymde.

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.summary: rtl or ltr. Changes text direction to support right-to-left languages. Defaults to ltr.

parameters.name: HideIcons
parameters.summary: An array of icon names to hide. Can be used to hide specific icons shown by default without     completely customizing the toolbar.

parameters.name: ShowIcons
parameters.summary: An array of icon names to show. Can be used to show specific icons hidden by default without     completely customizing the toolbar.

parameters.name: Toolbar
parameters.summary: [Optional] Gets or sets the content of the toolbar.

parameters.name: ToolbarTips
parameters.summary: If set to false, disable toolbar button tips. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: ToolbarButtonClassPrefix
parameters.summary: Adds a prefix to the toolbar button classes when set. For example, a value of `\"mde\"` results in `\"mde-bold\"` for the Bold button.

parameters.name: UploadImage
parameters.summary: If set to true, enables the image upload functionality, which can be triggered by drag-drop,     copy-paste and through the browse-file window (opened when the user click on the upload-image icon).     Defaults to true.

parameters.name: MaxUploadImageChunkSize
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the max chunk size when uploading the file. Take note that if you're using IFileEntry,CancellationToken) you're provided with a stream and should configure the chunk size when handling with the stream.
parameters.remarks: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/blazor/javascript-interoperability/call-dotnet-from-javascript?view=aspnetcore-6.0#stream-from-javascript-to-net

parameters.name: SegmentFetchTimeout
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the Segment Fetch Timeout when uploading the file.

parameters.name: ImageMaxSize
parameters.summary: Maximum image size in bytes, checked before upload (note: never trust client, always check image     size at server-side). Defaults to 1024*1024*2 (2Mb).

parameters.name: ImageAccept
parameters.summary: A comma-separated list of mime-types used to check image type before upload (note: never trust client, always     check file types at server-side). Defaults to image/png, image/jpeg.

parameters.name: ImageUploadEndpoint
parameters.summary: The endpoint where the images data will be sent, via an asynchronous POST request. The server is supposed to     save this image, and return a json response.

parameters.name: ImagePathAbsolute
parameters.summary: If set to true, will treat imageUrl from imageUploadFunction and filePath returned from imageUploadEndpoint as     an absolute rather than relative path, i.e. not prepend window.location.origin to it.

parameters.name: ImageCSRFToken
parameters.summary: CSRF token to include with AJAX call to upload image. For instance used with Django backend.

parameters.name: ImageTexts
parameters.summary: Texts displayed to the user (mainly on the status bar) for the import image feature, where     #image_name#, #image_size# and #image_max_size# will replaced by their respective values, that     can be used for customization or internationalization.

parameters.name: ErrorMessages
parameters.summary: Errors displayed to the user, using the errorCallback option, where #image_name#, #image_size#     and #image_max_size# will replaced by their respective values, that can be used for customization     or internationalization.

parameters.name: AutoRefresh
parameters.summary: Useful, when initializing the editor in a hidden DOM node. If set to { delay: 300 },     it will check every 300 ms if the editor is visible and if positive, call CodeMirror's refresh().

parameters.name: Autosave
parameters.summary: Saves the text that's being written and will load it back in the future.     It will forget the text when the form it's contained in is submitted.

parameters.name: BlockStyles
parameters.summary: Customize how certain buttons that style blocks of text behave.

parameters.name: ForceSync
parameters.summary: If set to true, force text changes made in EasyMDE to be immediately stored in original text area.     Defaults to false.

parameters.name: IndentWithTabs
parameters.summary: If set to false, indent using spaces instead of tabs. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: InputStyle
parameters.summary: textarea or contenteditable.     Defaults to textarea for desktop and contenteditable for mobile.     contenteditable option is necessary to enable nativeSpellcheck.

parameters.name: InsertTexts
parameters.summary: Customize how certain buttons that insert text behave. Takes an array with two elements.     The first element will be the text inserted before the cursor or highlight, and the second     element will be inserted after.     For example, this is the default link value: [\"[\", \"](http://)\"].

parameters.name: NativeSpellcheck
parameters.summary: If set to false, disable native spell checker. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: ParsingConfig
parameters.summary: Adjust settings for parsing the Markdown during editing (not previewing).

parameters.name: PreviewClass
parameters.summary: A space-separated strings that will be applied to the preview screen when activated.     Defaults to \"editor-preview\".

parameters.name: PreviewImagesInEditor
parameters.summary: EasyMDE will show preview of images, false by default,     preview for images will appear only for images on separate lines.

parameters.name: PromptTexts
parameters.summary: Customize the text used to prompt for URLs.

parameters.name: PromptURLs
parameters.summary: If set to true, a JS alert window appears asking for the link or image URL.     Defaults to false.

parameters.name: RenderingConfig
parameters.summary: Adjust settings for parsing the Markdown during previewing (not editing).

parameters.name: ScrollbarStyle
parameters.summary: Chooses a scrollbar implementation.     The default is \"native\", showing native scrollbars.          The core library also provides the \"null\" style, which completely hides the scrollbars.     Addons can implement additional scrollbar models.

parameters.name: Shortcuts
parameters.summary: Keyboard shortcuts associated with this instance. Defaults to the array of shortcuts.

parameters.name: SideBySideFullscreen
parameters.summary: If set to false, allows side-by-side editing without going into fullscreen. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: SpellChecker
parameters.summary: If set to false, disable the spell checker. Defaults to true

parameters.name: Status
parameters.summary: If set to empty array, hide the status bar. Defaults to the array of built-in status bar items.     Optionally, you can set an array of status bar items to include, and in what order.

parameters.name: StyleSelectedText
parameters.summary: If set to false, remove the CodeMirror-selectedtext class from selected lines. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: SyncSideBySidePreviewScroll
parameters.summary: If set to false, disable syncing scroll in side by side mode. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: UnorderedListStyle
parameters.summary: can be *, - or +. Defaults to *.

parameters.name: DisableProgressReport
parameters.summary:
Gets or sets whether report progress should be disabled. By enabling this setting, ImageUploadProgressed and ImageUploadWritten callbacks won't be called. Internal file progress won't be tracked.

This setting can speed up file transfer considerably.

parameters.name: AriaInvalid
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-invalid attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides the validation-derived aria-invalid state.

parameters.name: AriaDescribedBy
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aria-describedby attribute value.
parameters.remarks: When set, this value is rendered as-is and overrides help and validation message ids generated by Field and Validation.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the value inside the input field.

parameters.name: ValueExpression
parameters.summary: Gets or sets an expression that identifies the input value.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.summary: Sets the size of the input control.

parameters.name: ReadOnly
parameters.summary: Add the readonly boolean attribute on an input to prevent modification of the input’s value.

parameters.name: Disabled
parameters.summary: Add the disabled boolean attribute on an input to prevent user interactions and make it appear lighter.

parameters.name: Autofocus
parameters.summary: Set's the focus to the component after the rendering is done.

parameters.name: Feedback
parameters.summary: Placeholder for validation messages.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Markdown.

parameters.name: TabIndex
parameters.summary: If defined, indicates that its element can be focused and can participates in sequential keyboard navigation.

parameters.name: Classes
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class names for component elements.

parameters.name: Styles
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles for component elements.

parameters.name: Visibility

parameters.name: Width

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin

parameters.name: Padding

parameters.name: Border

parameters.name: TextAlignment

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration

parameters.name: TextWeight
