events.name: CustomButtonClicked
events.summary: Occurs after the custom toolbar button is clicked.

events.name: ImageUploadChanged
events.summary: Occurs every time the selected image has changed.

events.name: ImageUploadStarted
events.summary: Occurs when an individual image upload has started.

events.name: ImageUploadEnded
events.summary: Occurs when an individual image upload has ended.

events.name: ImageUploadWritten
events.summary: Occurs every time the part of image has being written to the destination stream.

events.name: ImageUploadProgressed
events.summary: Notifies the progress of image being written to the destination stream.

events.name: ErrorCallback
events.summary: A callback function used to define how to display an error message. Defaults to (errorMessage) => alert(errorMessage).

events.name: PreviewRender
events.summary: Custom function for parsing the plaintext Markdown and returning HTML. Used when user previews.

events.name: ValueChanged
events.summary: Occurs after value has changed.

events.name: KeyDown
events.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed down while the control has focus.

events.name: KeyPress
events.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

events.name: KeyUp
events.summary: Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.

events.name: Blur
events.summary: The blur event fires when an element has lost focus.

events.name: OnFocus
events.summary: Occurs when the input box gains or loses focus.

events.name: FocusIn
events.summary: Occurs when the input box gains focus.

events.name: FocusOut
events.summary: Occurs when the input box loses focus.

events.name: CustomValidationValue
events.summary: Used to provide custom validation value on which the validation will be processed with the Validator handler.
events.remarks: Should be used carefully as it's only meant for some special cases when input is used     in a wrapper component, like Autocomplete or SelectList.

methods.name: SetValueAsync

methods.name: UpdateInternalValue
methods.summary: Updates the internal markdown value. This method should only be called internally!

methods.name: UpdateFileEndedAsync
methods.summary: Notifies the component that file upload has ended.

methods.name: UpdateFileWrittenAsync
methods.summary: Updates component with the latest file data.

methods.name: UpdateFileProgressAsync
methods.summary: Updated the component with the latest upload progress.

methods.name: WriteToStreamAsync
methods.summary: Writes the file data to the target stream.

methods.name: OpenReadStream

methods.name: RemoveFileEntry
methods.summary: Removes the file entry from js dictionary.

methods.name: Focus
methods.summary: Sets the focus on the underline element.

methods.name: Revalidate

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents JavaScript options for initializing a markdown editor component.
       """

parameters.name: ReadOnly
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the editor should be read-only.

parameters.name: Disabled
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the editor should be disabled.

parameters.name: ClassNames
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value representing the computed classnames for the markdown editor.

parameters.name: StyleNames
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value representing the computed styles for the markdown editor.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the additional HTML attributes that will be applied to the markdown editor.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the initial markdown content value in the editor.

parameters.name: AutoDownloadFontAwesome
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether FontAwesome icons should be automatically downloaded.

parameters.name: HideIcons
parameters.summary: Gets or sets an array of icon names to hide from the toolbar.

parameters.name: ShowIcons
parameters.summary: Gets or sets an array of icon names to show in the toolbar.

parameters.name: LineNumbers
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether line numbers should be displayed in the editor.

parameters.name: LineWrapping
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether line wrapping is enabled in the editor.

parameters.name: MinHeight
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the minimum height of the editor.

parameters.name: MaxHeight
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the maximum height of the editor.

parameters.name: Placeholder
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the placeholder text displayed when the editor is empty.

parameters.name: TabSize
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the tab size for indentation in the editor.

parameters.name: Theme
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the theme of the editor (e.g., \"default\", \"dark\").

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the text direction of the editor (e.g., \"ltr\", \"rtl\").

parameters.name: Toolbar
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the toolbar configuration, including items and customization options.

parameters.name: ToolbarButtonClassPrefix
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a prefix to the toolbar button classes when set. For example, a value of `\"mde\"` results in `\"mde-bold\"` for the Bold button.

parameters.name: ToolbarTips
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether tooltips are shown on the toolbar.

parameters.name: UploadImage
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether image uploads are allowed.

parameters.name: ImageMaxSize
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size for uploaded images, in bytes.

parameters.name: ImageAccept
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the accepted image MIME types for uploading.

parameters.name: ImageUploadEndpoint
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the endpoint URL for uploading images.

parameters.name: ImagePathAbsolute
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether image paths are absolute.

parameters.name: ImageCSRFToken
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the CSRF token for image uploads.

parameters.name: ImageTexts
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the texts shown during image upload events.

parameters.name: ErrorMessages
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the error messages displayed within the editor.

parameters.name: Autofocus
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the editor should autofocus when initialized.

parameters.name: AutoRefresh
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the auto-refresh settings for the editor.

parameters.name: Autosave
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the autosave configuration for the editor.

parameters.name: BlockStyles
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the block style options for the editor.

parameters.name: ForceSync
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the editor content should be forcefully synchronized.

parameters.name: IndentWithTabs
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether tabs should be used for indentation.

parameters.name: InputStyle
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the input style for the editor.

parameters.name: InsertTexts
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the configuration for text insertion in the editor.

parameters.name: NativeSpellcheck
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether native spellcheck is enabled in the editor.

parameters.name: ParsingConfig
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the parsing configuration for the markdown content.

parameters.name: PreviewClass
parameters.summary: Gets or sets additional CSS classes for the preview panel.

parameters.name: PreviewImagesInEditor
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether images should be previewed within the editor.

parameters.name: PromptTexts
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the prompt texts for various user actions within the editor.

parameters.name: PromptURLs
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether URLs should prompt for confirmation before opening.

parameters.name: RenderingConfig
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the rendering configuration for markdown output.

parameters.name: ScrollbarStyle
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the style for the scrollbar in the editor.

parameters.name: Shortcuts
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcuts configuration for the editor.

parameters.name: SideBySideFullscreen
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the side-by-side preview is fullscreen.

parameters.name: SpellChecker

parameters.name: Status

parameters.name: StyleSelectedText

parameters.name: SyncSideBySidePreviewScroll
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the side-by-side preview scroll should be synchronized.

parameters.name: UnorderedListStyle
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the style of unordered lists (e.g., \"bullet\", \"dash\").

parameters.name: UsePreviewRender

components.summary: $""" Defines the action button for the Markdown toolbar. """

       Represents a component for viewing PDF documents within the application.
       """

parameters.summary: Gets or sets the source URL or base64 formated string of the PDF document to be loaded.

parameters.name: Scale
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the scale factor for displaying the PDF document. The default value is 1, which represents the original size.

parameters.name: Orientation

events.name: PageNumberChanged
events.summary: Gets or sets the callback event that is triggered when the page number changes.

events.name: Loaded
events.summary: Gets or sets the callback event that is triggered when the PDF document is loaded.

events.name: PrintRequested
events.summary: Gets or sets the callback event that is triggered when the PDF document is requested to be printed.

events.name: DownloadRequested
events.summary: Gets or sets the callback event that is triggered when the PDF document is requested to be downloaded.

events.name: ScaleChanged
events.summary: Gets or sets the callback event that is triggered when the scale changes.

methods.name: PreviousPage
methods.summary: Navigates to the previous page of the PDF document.

methods.name: NextPage
methods.summary: Navigates to the next page of the PDF document.

methods.name: GoToPage
methods.summary: Navigates to the specified page number in the PDF document.

methods.name: SetScale
methods.summary: Sets the scale factor for displaying the PDF document.

methods.name: Print
methods.summary: Prints the currently loaded PDF document.

methods.name: Download
methods.summary: Downloads the currently loaded PDF document.

methods.name: NotifyPdfInitialized
methods.summary: Notifies that a PDF document has been loaded.

methods.name: NotifyPdfChanged
methods.summary: Notifies that the page number of the PDF document has changed.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents JavaScript options for configuring a QR code generator.
       """

parameters.name: Value
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the value or content encoded within the QR code.

parameters.name: EccLevel
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the error correction level of the QR code (e.g., \"L\", \"M\", \"Q\", \"H\").

parameters.name: DarkColor
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the color for the dark modules of the QR code.

parameters.name: LightColor
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the color for the light modules of the QR code.

parameters.name: PixelsPerModule
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the number of pixels per module, determining the size of the QR code.

parameters.name: DrawQuietZones
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether quiet zones (margins) should be drawn around the QR code.

parameters.name: Icon
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the path or URL of an icon to be displayed in the center of the QR code.

parameters.name: IconSizePercentage
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the size of the icon as a percentage of the QR code size.

parameters.name: IconBorderWidth
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the width of the border around the icon, in pixels.

parameters.name: Gap

parameters.name: Display

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex

parameters.name: Position

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment

events.name: ContentChanged
events.summary: Occurs when the content within the editor changes.

events.name: EnterPressed
events.summary: Occurs when the enter key is pressed within the editor.
events.remarks: This event is triggered only when SubmitOnEnter is enabled.

events.name: EditorFocus
events.summary: Occurs when the editor gains focus.

events.name: EditorBlur
events.summary: Occurs when the editor loses focus.

events.name: ValueChanged
events.summary: Occurs after value has changed.

events.name: KeyDown
events.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed down while the control has focus.

events.name: KeyPress
events.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

events.name: KeyUp
events.summary: Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.

events.name: Blur
events.summary: The blur event fires when an element has lost focus.

events.name: OnFocus
events.summary: Occurs when the input box gains or loses focus.

events.name: FocusIn
events.summary: Occurs when the input box gains focus.

events.name: FocusOut
events.summary: Occurs when the input box loses focus.

events.name: CustomValidationValue
events.summary: Used to provide custom validation value on which the validation will be processed with the Validator handler.
events.remarks: Should be used carefully as it's only meant for some special cases when input is used     in a wrapper component, like Autocomplete or SelectList.

methods.name: SetHtmlAsync
methods.summary: Sets the editor content as HTML asynchronously.
methods.remarks: Improper handling of HTML can lead to cross-site scripting (XSS). Ensure that the HTML content is properly sanitized before setting it in the editor.

methods.name: GetHtmlAsync
methods.summary: Gets the editor content as HTML asynchronously.

methods.name: SetDeltaAsync
methods.summary: Sets the editor content as a Quill Delta JSON asynchronously.
methods.remarks: The Quill Delta format is a rich text format used by the Quill editor. See the official Quill.js documentation for more details.

methods.name: GetDeltaAsync
methods.summary: Gets the editor content as a Quill Delta JSON asynchronously.

methods.name: SetTextAsync
methods.summary: Sets the editor content as plain text asynchronously.

methods.name: GetTextAsync
methods.summary: Gets the editor content as plain text asynchronously.

methods.name: ClearAsync
methods.summary: Clears the editor content asynchronously.

methods.name: OnContentChanged
methods.summary: Javascript callback for when content changes.

methods.name: OnEnter
methods.summary: Javascript callback for when enter is pressed.

methods.name: OnEditorFocus
methods.summary: Javascript callback for when editor get focus.

methods.name: OnEditorBlur
methods.summary: Javascript callback for when editor lost focus.

methods.name: Focus
methods.summary: Sets the focus on the underline element.

methods.name: Revalidate
methods.summary: Forces the Validation (if any is used) to re-validate with the new custom or internal value.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents options for retrieving HTML content from a rich text editor.
       """

parameters.name: IsSemanticHtml
parameters.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to use semantic HTML when retrieving the editor content. If true, the content will be retrieved using Quill's getSemanticHTML() method. If false, the content will be retrieved from the editor's inner HTML.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.summary: Gets the starting index from which to retrieve the content. Only used if IsSemanticHtml is true.

parameters.name: Length
parameters.summary: Gets the optional length of content to retrieve. If not specified, the content will be retrieved from Index to the end of the document. Only used if IsSemanticHtml is true.

methods.name: InnerHtml
methods.summary: Creates a new RichTextEditHtmlOptions instance for retrieving raw inner HTML content.

methods.name: SemanticHtml
methods.summary: Creates a new RichTextEditHtmlOptions instance for retrieving semantic HTML content.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents a scheduler component that manages and displays appointments, allowing navigation and editing of scheduled items.
       """

parameters.name: Data
parameters.summary: Holds a collection of items of type <typeparamref name=\"TItem\"/>. Used to manage and display a list of appointments.

parameters.name: Date
parameters.summary: The currently selected date. Determines the date that is displayed in the scheduler. Defaults to the current date.

parameters.name: WeekNavigationMode
parameters.summary: The mode of the week navigation. Determines how the week navigation is handled.

parameters.name: SelectedView
parameters.summary: The currently selected view. Determines the view that is displayed in the scheduler.

parameters.name: ShowToolbar
parameters.summary: Indicates if the toolbar should be displayed.

parameters.name: IdField
parameters.summary: Defines the field name of the Scheduler that represents the unique identifier of the appointment. Defaults to \"Id\".

parameters.name: StartField
parameters.summary: Defines the field name of the Scheduler that represents the start date of the appointment. Defaults to \"Start\".

parameters.name: EndField
parameters.summary: Defines the field name of the Scheduler that represents the end date of the appointment. Defaults to \"End\".

parameters.name: TitleField
parameters.summary: Defines the field name of the Scheduler that represents the title of the appointment. Defaults to \"Title\".

parameters.name: DescriptionField
parameters.summary: Defines the field name of the Scheduler that represents the description of the appointment. Defaults to \"Description\".

parameters.name: AllDayField
parameters.summary: Defines the field name of the Scheduler that represents the all-day status of the appointment. Defaults to \"AllDay\".

parameters.name: RecurrenceRuleField
parameters.summary: Defines the field name of the Scheduler that represents the recurrence rule string in iCalendar (RFC 5545) compliance rules.

parameters.name: RecurrenceIdField
parameters.summary: Defines the field name of the Scheduler that represents the recurrence ID of the appointment. This is used to identify the master appointment in a recurring series.

parameters.name: OriginalStartField
parameters.summary: Defines the field name of the Scheduler that represents the original start date of the appointment. This is used to store the original start date of a recurring series.

parameters.name: RecurrenceExceptionsField
parameters.summary: Defines the field name of the Scheduler that represents the recurrence exceptions. This is used to store the dates of the exceptions in a recurring series.

parameters.name: DeletedOccurrencesField
parameters.summary: Defines the field name of the Scheduler that represents the deleted occurrences. This is used to store the dates of the deleted occurrences in a recurring series.

parameters.name: Editable
parameters.summary: Indicates whether the component is editable. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: Draggable
parameters.summary: Indicates whether the items in the scheduler can be dragged and dropped. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: SlotSelectionMode
parameters.summary: Indicates how the slots can be selected. Defaults to Disabled.

parameters.name: UseInternalEditing
parameters.summary: Indicates whether internal editing is enabled. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: Localizers
parameters.summary: Custom localizer handlers to override default Scheduler localization.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the content to be rendered inside the component.
parameters.remarks: This property allows developers to define custom content within the Scheduler component.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

events.name: DateChanged
events.summary: Occurs when the selected date changes.

events.name: SelectedViewChanged
events.summary: Occurs when the selected view changes.

events.name: NewItemCreator
events.summary: Defines a function that creates a new item of type TItem. It allows for custom item creation logic.

events.name: NewIdCreator
events.summary: Defines a function that creates a new ID for the item. It allows for custom ID generation logic.

events.name: ItemInserting
events.summary: Triggers an event when a new item is being inserted into the scheduler. It allows handling and cancellation of the item insert process.

events.name: ItemUpdating
events.summary: An event callback triggered when an item is being updated in the scheduler. It allows handling and cancellation of the item update process.

events.name: ItemRemoving
events.summary: An event callback triggered when an item is being removed from the scheduler. It allows handling and cancellation of the removal process.

events.name: ItemInserted
events.summary: Triggers an event when a new item is inserted into the scheduler.

events.name: ItemUpdated
events.summary: Triggers an event when an item in the scheduler is updated.

events.name: ItemRemoved
events.summary: Triggers an event when an item in the scheduler is deleted.

events.name: SlotClicked
events.summary: Occurs when an empty slot is clicked.

events.name: SlotsSelected
events.summary: Occurs when an empty slot is clicked.

events.name: EditItemClicked
events.summary: An event callback triggered when an item is clicked for editing.

events.name: DeleteItemClicked
events.summary: An event callback triggered when an item is clicked for deletion.

events.name: DragStarted
events.summary: Triggered when a drag operation starts.

events.name: DragCancelled
events.summary: Triggered when a drag operation is cancelled.

events.name: DropAllowed
events.summary: Defines a function that determines if a drop action is allowed during a drag-and-drop operation.

events.name: ItemDropped
events.summary: Triggered when an item is dropped into a new slot.

events.name: ItemStyling
events.summary: Defines a callback for customizing the styling of items in a Scheduler.

methods.name: NavigatePreviousPeriod
methods.summary: Navigates to the previous date or period based on the current view mode of the scheduler.

methods.name: NavigateNextPeriod
methods.summary: Navigates to the next date or period based on the current view mode of the scheduler.

methods.name: NavigateToday
methods.summary: Navigates to today's date, updating the selected date to the current day and refreshing the view.

methods.name: ShowDayView
methods.summary: Sets the selected view to 'Day' and triggers an update to reflect this change.

methods.name: ShowWeekView
methods.summary: Sets the selected view to 'Week' and triggers an update to reflect this change.

methods.name: ShowWorkWeekView
methods.summary: Sets the selected view to 'WorkWeek' and triggers an update to reflect this change.

methods.name: ShowMonthView
methods.summary: Sets the selected view to 'Month' and triggers an update to reflect this change.

methods.name: New
methods.summary: Creates a new appointment by invoking the New() method with a newly created item.

methods.name: New
methods.summary: Creates a new item and sets the editing state to 'New'. If conditions are met, it displays a modal for editing the item.

methods.name: Edit
methods.summary: Sets the Scheduler into the Edit state mode for the specified item.

methods.name: Delete
methods.summary: Deletes the specified item from the Data source.

methods.name: EditOccurrence
methods.summary: Opens the modal dialog for editing a single occurrence of a recurring item.

methods.name: CancelSelection
methods.summary: Cancels the current selection if a transaction is in progress, rolling back any changes made during the selection. Should not be called directly by the user!

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents a view for scheduling events on a daily basis within a scheduler framework.
       """

parameters.name: ItemCellHeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the height of a cell in a layout. The value is a double representing the height in pixels.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.summary: Defines the first hour displayed in the view. Default is 00:00.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.summary: Defines when the day ends.

parameters.name: WorkDayStart
parameters.summary: Represents the start time of a workday, using a nullable TimeOnly type. It allows for the specification of a workday's beginning time.

parameters.name: WorkDayEnd
parameters.summary: Represents the optional end time of a workday as a TimeOnly value. It can be null if not specified.

parameters.name: SlotsPerCell
parameters.summary: Defines the number of slots available per cell, defaulting to 2. This parameter can be adjusted to change the cell configuration.

parameters.name: HeaderCellHeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the height of the header cell in pixels. The default value is set to 60.

parameters.name: FirstDayOfWeek
parameters.summary: The first day of the week. Determines the first day of the week that is displayed in the scheduler. Default is Sunday.

parameters.name: ViewHeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the height of the view in pixels. This property is optional and can be set to null if no specific height is required.

parameters.name: ItemTemplate
parameters.summary: Defines a template for rendering regular items in a scheduler view.

parameters.name: AllDayItemTemplate
parameters.summary: Defines a template for rendering all-day items in a scheduler view.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents a monthly view in a scheduler, allowing customization of how the entire month is displayed,     including the size of day cells and the overall layout.
       """

parameters.name: ItemCellHeight
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the height of each day cell in the month view layout, measured in pixels.
parameters.remarks: This value controls the vertical space allocated to each day in the month grid. The default value is 100.

parameters.name: ShowWeekNumbers
parameters.summary: Indicates whether to display week numbers in a calendar. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.summary: Defines the first hour displayed in the view. Default is 00:00.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.summary: Defines when the day ends.

parameters.name: WorkDayStart
parameters.summary: Represents the start time of a workday, using a nullable TimeOnly type. It allows for the specification of a workday's beginning time.

parameters.name: WorkDayEnd
parameters.summary: Represents the optional end time of a workday as a TimeOnly value. It can be null if not specified.

parameters.name: SlotsPerCell
parameters.summary: Defines the number of slots available per cell, defaulting to 2. This parameter can be adjusted to change the cell configuration.

parameters.name: HeaderCellHeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the height of the header cell in pixels. The default value is set to 60.

parameters.name: FirstDayOfWeek
parameters.summary: The first day of the week. Determines the first day of the week that is displayed in the scheduler. Default is Sunday.

parameters.name: ViewHeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the height of the view in pixels. This property is optional and can be set to null if no specific height is required.

parameters.name: ItemTemplate
parameters.summary: Defines a template for rendering regular items in a scheduler view.

parameters.name: AllDayItemTemplate
parameters.summary: Defines a template for rendering all-day items in a scheduler view.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents a weekly view in a scheduler, allowing customization of the displayed week.     Displays a grid of days and time slots for the selected week.
       """

parameters.name: ItemCellHeight
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the height of each appointment cell in the grid.
parameters.remarks: The value is a double representing the height in pixels.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.summary: Defines the first hour displayed in the view. Default is 00:00.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.summary: Defines when the day ends.

parameters.name: WorkDayStart
parameters.summary: Represents the start time of a workday, using a nullable TimeOnly type. It allows for the specification of a workday's beginning time.

parameters.name: WorkDayEnd
parameters.summary: Represents the optional end time of a workday as a TimeOnly value. It can be null if not specified.

parameters.name: SlotsPerCell
parameters.summary: Defines the number of slots available per cell, defaulting to 2. This parameter can be adjusted to change the cell configuration.

parameters.name: HeaderCellHeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the height of the header cell in pixels. The default value is set to 60.

parameters.name: FirstDayOfWeek
parameters.summary: The first day of the week. Determines the first day of the week that is displayed in the scheduler. Default is Sunday.

parameters.name: ViewHeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the height of the view in pixels. This property is optional and can be set to null if no specific height is required.

parameters.name: ItemTemplate
parameters.summary: Defines a template for rendering regular items in a scheduler view.

parameters.name: AllDayItemTemplate
parameters.summary: Defines a template for rendering all-day items in a scheduler view.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents a scheduler view that displays only the working days of the week (typically Monday through Friday).     Allows customization of the first workday and cell height.
       """

parameters.name: FirstDayOfWorkWeek
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the first day of the work week.     Determines the starting day of the work week in the scheduler view.
parameters.remarks: The default value is DayOfWeek.Monday.

parameters.name: ItemCellHeight
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the height of each appointment cell in the layout.
parameters.remarks: The value is in pixels and affects vertical sizing of time slots.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.summary: Defines the first hour displayed in the view. Default is 00:00.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.summary: Defines when the day ends.

parameters.name: WorkDayStart
parameters.summary: Represents the start time of a workday, using a nullable TimeOnly type. It allows for the specification of a workday's beginning time.

parameters.name: WorkDayEnd
parameters.summary: Represents the optional end time of a workday as a TimeOnly value. It can be null if not specified.

parameters.name: SlotsPerCell
parameters.summary: Defines the number of slots available per cell, defaulting to 2. This parameter can be adjusted to change the cell configuration.

parameters.name: HeaderCellHeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the height of the header cell in pixels. The default value is set to 60.

parameters.name: FirstDayOfWeek
parameters.summary: The first day of the week. Determines the first day of the week that is displayed in the scheduler. Default is Sunday.

parameters.name: ViewHeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the height of the view in pixels. This property is optional and can be set to null if no specific height is required.

parameters.name: ItemTemplate
parameters.summary: Defines a template for rendering regular items in a scheduler view.

parameters.name: AllDayItemTemplate
parameters.summary: Defines a template for rendering all-day items in a scheduler view.

components.summary:
$"""
       The SignaturePad component allows for the creation of a digital signature pad, which allows users to draw signatures using a mouse, touchpad, or stylus. This component can be used in various applications such as electronic forms, contracts, and agreements.
       """

parameters.name: Value
parameters.summary: Gets or sets value for the signature pad.

parameters.name: DotSize
parameters.summary: The radius of a single dot. Also the width of the start of a mark.

parameters.name: MinLineWidth
parameters.summary: The minimum width of a line.

parameters.name: MaxLineWidth
parameters.summary: The maximum width of a line.

parameters.name: Throttle
parameters.summary: The time in milliseconds to throttle drawing. Set to 0 to turn off throttling.

parameters.name: MinDistance
parameters.summary: Add the next point only if the previous one is farther than 'n' pixels. Defaults to 5.

parameters.name: BackgroundColor
parameters.summary: The color used to define the background color of the signature pad. Can be any color format; including HEX, or rgb.

parameters.name: PenColor
parameters.summary: The color used to define the lines color of the signature pad. Can be any color format; including HEX, or rgb.

parameters.name: VelocityFilterWeight
parameters.summary: The weight used to modify new velocity based on the previous velocity.

parameters.name: ImageType
parameters.summary: The image type [png, jpeg, svg] to get from the canvas element.

parameters.name: ImageQuality
parameters.summary: The encoder options for image type [png, jpeg] to get from the canvas element. Accepted range is from 0 to 1, where 1 means best quality.

parameters.name: IncludeImageBackgroundColor
parameters.summary: If true, the [svg] image returned from the canvas will include background color defined by the BackgroundColor parameter.

parameters.name: ReadOnly
parameters.summary: If true, prevents the user interaction.

parameters.name: TabIndex
parameters.summary: If defined, indicates that its element can be focused and can participates in sequential keyboard navigation.

parameters.name: CanvasWidth
parameters.summary: Defines the width, in pixels, of the underline canvas element.

parameters.name: CanvasHeight
parameters.summary: Defines the height, in pixels, of the underline canvas element.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

events.name: ValueChanged
events.summary: Gets or sets the event that is triggered when the signature pad value changes. The event provides the new signature as a byte array.

events.name: BeginStroke
events.summary: Gets or sets the event that is triggered when a new stroke begins on the signature pad. The event provides information about the starting point of the stroke.

events.name: EndStroke
events.summary: Gets or sets the event that is triggered when a stroke ends on the signature pad. The event provides the signature pad's current image data as a Data URL.

methods.name: Clear
methods.summary: Clears the content of a signature canvas.

methods.name: Undo
methods.summary: Undos the last stroke if there is any.

methods.name: NotifyBeginStroke
methods.summary: This method is called by JavaScript when a new stroke has begun in the signature pad. It invokes the BeginStroke     event asynchronously to notify any subscribers of the event.

methods.name: NotifyEndStroke
methods.summary: This method is called by JavaScript when a stroke has ended in the signature pad. It takes the encoded image     from the signature pad, converts it to bytes and sets the Value property of the component to the image data.     It then invokes the ValueChanged and EndStroke events asynchronously to notify any subscribers of the change.

methods.name: GetDataUrl
methods.summary: Gets the data url based on the image type and the data array.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents JavaScript options for initializing a signature pad component.
       """

parameters.name: DataUrl
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the initial data URL for the signature image.

parameters.name: DotSize
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the default dot size for points drawn on the signature pad.

parameters.name: MinLineWidth
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the minimum width for lines drawn on the signature pad.

parameters.name: MaxLineWidth
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width for lines drawn on the signature pad.

parameters.name: Throttle
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the throttling interval, in milliseconds, for limiting data points.

parameters.name: MinDistance
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the minimum distance between points to be considered as separate.

parameters.name: BackgroundColor
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the signature pad.

parameters.name: PenColor
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the color of the pen used for drawing on the signature pad.

parameters.name: VelocityFilterWeight
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the velocity filter weight for line thickness adjustment based on speed.

parameters.name: ImageType
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the image type for exporting the signature (e.g., \"image/png\").

parameters.name: ImageQuality
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the quality of the exported image, from 0 to 1, if applicable.

parameters.name: IncludeImageBackgroundColor
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to include the background color when exporting the image.

parameters.name: ReadOnly
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the signature pad is read-only.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents JavaScript options for updating specific settings of a signature pad component dynamically.
       """

parameters.name: DataUrl
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the data URL of the signature image.

parameters.name: DotSize
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the dot size on the signature pad.

parameters.name: MinLineWidth
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the minimum line width.

parameters.name: MaxLineWidth
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the maximum line width.

parameters.name: Throttle
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the throttling interval in milliseconds.

parameters.name: MinDistance
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the minimum distance between points.

parameters.name: BackgroundColor
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the background color of the signature pad.

parameters.name: PenColor
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the pen color used for drawing.

parameters.name: VelocityFilterWeight
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the velocity filter weight for line thickness.

parameters.name: ImageType
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the image type used for exporting.

parameters.name: ImageQuality
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the image quality when exporting.

parameters.name: IncludeImageBackgroundColor
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for including the background color in the exported image.

parameters.name: ReadOnly
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for setting the signature pad as read-only.

components.summary:
$"""
       The video component embeds a media player which supports video playback into the document.
       """

parameters.name: Controls
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the controls visibility of the player.

parameters.name: ControlsDelay
parameters.summary: The default amount of delay in milliseconds while media playback is progressing without user activity to indicate an idle state and hide controls.

parameters.name: AutomaticallyHideControls
parameters.summary: Hide video controls automatically after 2s of no mouse or focus movement, on control element blur (tab out), on playback     start or entering fullscreen. As soon as the mouse is moved, a control element is focused or playback is paused, the     controls reappear instantly.

parameters.name: AutoPlay
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the autoplay state of the player.

parameters.name: AutoPause
parameters.summary: Only allow one player playing at once.

parameters.name: Muted
parameters.summary: Whether to start playback muted.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the current source for the player.

parameters.name: Poster
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the the URL of media poster or thumbnail image, generally before playback begins.

parameters.name: Thumbnails
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the URL of thumbnails which will be used to display preview images when interacting with the time slider and in the chapters menu.

parameters.name: StreamingLibrary
parameters.summary: If defined the video will run in streaming mode.

parameters.name: SeekTime
parameters.summary: The time, in seconds, to seek when a user hits fast forward or rewind.

parameters.name: CurrentTime
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the currentTime for the player.

parameters.name: Volume
parameters.summary: A number, between 0 and 1, representing the initial volume of the player.

parameters.name: ClickToPlay
parameters.summary: Click (or tap) of the video container will toggle play/pause.

parameters.name: DisableContextMenu
parameters.summary: Disable right click menu on video to help as very primitive obfuscation to prevent downloads of content.

parameters.name: ResetOnEnd
parameters.summary: Reset the playback to the start once playback is complete.

parameters.name: Ratio
parameters.summary: Force an aspect ratio for all videos. The format is 'w:h' - e.g. '16:9' or '4:3'. If this is not specified     then the default for HTML5 and Vimeo is to use the native resolution of the video. As dimensions are not     available from YouTube via SDK, 16:9 is forced as a sensible default.

parameters.name: InvertTime
parameters.summary: Display the current time as a countdown rather than an incremental counter.

parameters.name: ProtectionType
parameters.summary: Defines the encoding type used for the DRM protection.

parameters.name: ProtectionData
parameters.summary: Defines the manual structure of the protection data. If defined, it will override the usage of ProtectionServerUrl and ProtectionHttpRequestHeaders.

parameters.name: ProtectionServerUrl
parameters.summary: Defines the server url of the DRM protection.

parameters.name: ProtectionServerCertificateUrl
parameters.summary: Defines the server certificate url of the DRM protection (currently used only with FairPlay).

parameters.name: ProtectionHttpRequestHeaders
parameters.summary: Defines the protection token for the http header that is sent to the server.

parameters.name: ControlsList
parameters.defaultValue: new string[] { VideoControlsType.PlayLarge, VideoControlsType.Play, VideoControlsType.Progress, VideoControlsType.CurrentTime, VideoControlsType.Mute, VideoControlsType.Volume, VideoControlsType.Captions, VideoControlsType.Settings, VideoControlsType.Pip, VideoControlsType.Airplay, VideoControlsType.Fullscreen }
parameters.summary: Defines the customized list of player controls.

parameters.name: SettingsList
parameters.defaultValue: new VideoSettingsType[] { VideoSettingsType.Captions, VideoSettingsType.Quality, VideoSettingsType.Speed, VideoSettingsType.Loop }
parameters.summary: If the default controls are used, you can specify which settings to show in the menu.

parameters.name: DefaultQuality
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the default quality for the player.

parameters.name: AvailableQualities
parameters.summary: Defines the list of available quality options. Defaults to [4320, 2880, 2160, 1440, 1080, 720, 576, 480, 360, 240].

parameters.name: DoubleClickToFullscreen
parameters.summary: If defined the player will go fullscreen when the video is double-clicked.

parameters.name: ChildContent
parameters.summary: Specifies the content to be rendered inside this Video.

parameters.name: ElementId
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of the element.
parameters.remarks: Note that this ID is not defined for the component but instead for the underlined element that it represents.     eg: for the TextInput the ID will be set on the input element.

parameters.name: Class
parameters.summary: Custom CSS class name to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Style
parameters.summary: Custom inline styles to apply to the component.

parameters.name: Float
parameters.summary: Specifies how an element should float within its containing block.

parameters.name: Clearfix
parameters.summary: Determines whether to apply clearfix to manage floating children.

parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.summary: Controls the visibility of an element without altering its layout.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.summary: Defines the width of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Defines the height of the component using responsive sizing utilities.

parameters.name: Margin
parameters.summary: Configures the margin spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Padding
parameters.summary: Configures the padding spacing for the component.

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.summary: Configures the gap spacing between child elements of the component.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.summary: Specifies the display behavior (e.g., block, inline, flex) of the component.

parameters.name: Border
parameters.summary: Configures the border properties of the component.

parameters.name: Flex
parameters.summary: Configures the flexbox properties of the component.

parameters.name: Position
parameters.summary: Specifies the positioning method for the component (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.summary: Configures the overflow behavior when content exceeds the component's bounds.

parameters.name: Casing
parameters.summary: Specifies the text casing transformation (e.g., uppercase, lowercase).

parameters.name: TextColor
parameters.summary: Defines the text color of the component.

parameters.name: TextAlignment
parameters.summary: Configures the horizontal alignment of text within the component.

parameters.name: TextTransform
parameters.summary: Configures the text transformation (e.g., capitalize, none) of the component.

parameters.name: TextDecoration
parameters.summary: Defines the text decoration style (e.g., underline, none) for the component.

parameters.name: TextWeight
parameters.summary: Specifies the font weight of text in the component (e.g., bold, normal).

parameters.name: TextOverflow
parameters.summary: Configures how text behaves when it overflows its container.

parameters.name: TextSize
parameters.summary: Sets the font size of the text in the component.

parameters.name: ObjectFit
parameters.summary: Configures the object-fit property, which determines how content is resized within its container.

parameters.name: VerticalAlignment
parameters.summary: Specifies the vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Sets the background color of the component.

parameters.name: Shadow
parameters.summary: Configures the shadow effect of the component.

parameters.name: UtilityTarget
parameters.summary: Specifies the default target where utility classes and styles are applied when no per-utility target is set.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.summary: Captures unmatched HTML attributes for customization.
parameters.remarks: These attributes are applied directly to the component's root HTML element.

events.name: Progress
events.summary: Sent periodically to inform interested parties of progress downloading the media. Information about the current amount of the media that has been downloaded is available in the media element's buffered attribute.

events.name: Playing
events.summary: Sent when the media begins to play (either for the first time, after having been paused, or after ending and then restarting).

events.name: Played
events.summary: Sent when playback of the media starts after having been paused; that is, when playback is resumed after a prior pause event.

events.name: Paused
events.summary: Sent when playback is paused.

events.name: TimeUpdate
events.summary: The time indicated by the element's currentTime attribute has changed.

events.name: VolumeChange
events.summary: Sent when the audio volume changes (both when the volume is set and when the muted state is changed).

events.name: Seeking
events.summary: Sent when a seek operation begins.

events.name: Seeked
events.summary: Sent when a seek operation completes.

events.name: RateChange
events.summary: Sent when the playback speed changes.

events.name: Ended
events.summary: Sent when playback completes. Note: This does not fire if autoplay is true.

events.name: FullScreenEntered
events.summary: Sent when the player enters fullscreen mode (either the proper fullscreen or full-window fallback for older browsers).

events.name: FullScreenExited
events.summary: Sent when the player exits fullscreen mode.

events.name: CaptionsEnabled
events.summary: Sent when captions are enabled.

events.name: CaptionsDisabled
events.summary: Sent when captions are disabled.

events.name: LanguageChange
events.summary: Sent when the caption language is changed.

events.name: ControlsHidden
events.summary: Sent when the controls are hidden.

events.name: ControlsShown
events.summary: Sent when the controls are shown.

events.name: Ready
events.summary: Triggered when the instance is ready for API calls.

events.name: QualityChanged
events.summary:
The quality of playback has changed.

If the quality argument is null it is considered that a default quality value was selected.

methods.name: UpdateSource
methods.summary: Updates the media source.

methods.name: Play
methods.summary: Start playback.

methods.name: Pause
methods.summary: Pause playback.

methods.name: TogglePlay
methods.summary: Toggle playback, if no parameters are passed, it will toggle based on current status.

methods.name: Stop
methods.summary: Stop playback and reset to start.

methods.name: Restart
methods.summary: Restart playback.

methods.name: Rewind
methods.summary: Rewind playback by the specified seek time.

methods.name: Forward
methods.summary: Fast forward by the specified seek time. If no parameter is passed, the default seek time will be used.

methods.name: IncreaseVolume
methods.summary: Increase volume by the specified step. If no parameter is passed, the default step will be used.

methods.name: DecreaseVolume
methods.summary: Decrease volume by the specified step. If no parameter is passed, the default step will be used.

methods.name: ToggleCaptions
methods.summary: Toggle captions display.

methods.name: EnterFullscreen
methods.summary: Enter fullscreen. If fullscreen is not supported, a fallback \"full window/viewport\" is used instead.

methods.name: ExitFullscreen
methods.summary: Exit fullscreen.

methods.name: ToggleFullscreen
methods.summary: Toggle fullscreen.

methods.name: Airplay
methods.summary: Trigger the airplay dialog on supported devices.

methods.name: ToggleControls
methods.summary: Toggle the controls (video only). Takes optional truthy value to force it on/off.

methods.name: ShowTextTrack
methods.summary: Show the track from the list of tracks.

methods.name: HideTextTrack
methods.summary: Hide the track from the list of tracks.

methods.name: AddTextTrack
methods.summary: Adds a new text track to the list of tracks.

methods.name: ClearTextTracks
methods.summary: Clear all the text tracks.

methods.name: SetPlaybackRate
methods.summary: Dispatch an event to change the media playback rate.

methods.name: NotifyProgress
methods.summary: Notifies the video component of the media progress so far. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyPlaying
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the media is playing. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyPlay
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the media is started to play. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyPause
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the media is paused. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyTimeUpdate
methods.summary: Notifies the video component how much time has passed since the media started playing. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyVolumeChange
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the volume has changed. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifySeeking
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the media is in seeking mode. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifySeeked
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the media has ended seeking. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyRateChange
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the media speed rate has changed. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyEnded
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the media has ended. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyFullScreenEntered
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the video is entered the fullscreen mode. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyFullScreenExited
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the video is exited from fullscreen mode. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyCaptionsEnabled
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the video has enabled captions. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyCaptionsDisabled
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the video has disabled captions. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyLanguageChange
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the language has changed. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyControlsHidden
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the controls are now hidded. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyControlsShown
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the controls are now visible. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyReady
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the player is now ready. Should not be called directly by the user!

methods.name: NotifyQualityChange
methods.summary: Notifies the video component that the quality has changed. Should not be called directly by the user!

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents JavaScript options for initializing a video player component.
       """

parameters.name: Controls
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether video controls are displayed.

parameters.name: ControlsDelay
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the delay in seconds before controls are shown.

parameters.name: ControlsList
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a list of controls to be displayed or hidden.

parameters.name: SettingsList
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a list of video settings types available in the player.

parameters.name: AutomaticallyHideControls
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether controls are automatically hidden.

parameters.name: AutoPlay
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the video should start playing automatically.

parameters.name: AutoPause
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the video should automatically pause when not in view.

parameters.name: Muted
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the video is muted.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the source configuration for the video.

parameters.name: Poster
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the poster image URL displayed before the video starts.

parameters.name: Thumbnails
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the thumbnail images for video navigation.

parameters.name: StreamingLibrary
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the streaming library to use for video playback.

parameters.name: SeekTime
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the time to skip when seeking forward or backward, in seconds.

parameters.name: CurrentTime
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the current playback time of the video in seconds.

parameters.name: Volume
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the volume level of the video, between 0 and 1.

parameters.name: ClickToPlay
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether clicking on the video toggles play/pause.

parameters.name: DisableContextMenu
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the context menu is disabled.

parameters.name: ResetOnEnd
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the video resets to the beginning when it ends.

parameters.name: AspectRatio
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the aspect ratio of the video.

parameters.name: InvertTime
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the time is displayed in reverse countdown format.

parameters.name: DefaultQuality
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the default quality options for the video.

parameters.name: AvailableQualities
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the available quality options for the video.

parameters.name: Protection
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the video protection options for DRM or other access control mechanisms.

parameters.name: DoubleClickToFullscreen
parameters.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether double-clicking toggles fullscreen mode.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents JavaScript options for updating specific settings of a video player component dynamically.
       """

parameters.name: Source
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the video source.

parameters.name: ProtectionType
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the video protection type.

parameters.name: ProtectionData
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the video protection data.

parameters.name: ProtectionServerUrl
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the protection server URL.

parameters.name: ProtectionServerCertificateUrl
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the protection server certificate URL.

parameters.name: ProtectionHttpRequestHeaders
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating HTTP request headers for protection.

parameters.name: CurrentTime
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the current playback time.

parameters.name: Volume
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the option for updating the video volume level.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents quality options for the video, including resolution height.
       """

parameters.name: Height
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the height of the video resolution.

components.summary:
$"""
       Represents video protection options, including DRM configuration and server details.
       """

parameters.name: Data
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the data object used for video protection, such as license or certificate data.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the type of video protection.

parameters.name: ServerUrl
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the protection server.

parameters.name: ServerCertificateUrl
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the server certificate for protected streams.

parameters.name: HttpRequestHeaders
parameters.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP headers used for requests to the protection server.
